Sichuan
四川

Pop 80.1 million
人口 8010 万

Why Go?
为什么要去？

It’s fitting that an ancient form of opera and magic called biànliǎn (face-changing) originated here, for Sichuan (四川, Sìchuān) is a land of many guises. Capital Chengdu shows a modern face, but just beyond its ring roads you’ll find a more traditional landscape of mist-shrouded, sacred mountains, and a countryside scattered with ancient villages and cliffs of carved Buddhas.
一种古老的戏曲和魔术形式 ，称为变脸，起源于这里是恰当的，因为四川（ 四川 ，Sìchuān）是一个多面八方的土地。首都成都呈现出现代的面貌，但在它的环路之外，你会发现更传统的景观，有雾气笼罩的圣山，以及散布着古老村庄和雕刻佛像的悬崖的乡村。

Central Sichuan is also home to the giant panda, the most famous face in China. In the south, expect a veil of history and a muted beauty that sees far fewer travellers than the rest of the region. To the north the visage changes again into a fairyland of alpine valleys and blue-green lakes. Sichuan’s Tibetan side appears as you venture west. This is Kham, one of the former Tibetan prefectures: a vast landscape of plateau grasslands and glacial mountains where Tibetan culture still thrives and you’re certain to have your most challenging, yet most magical, experiences.
川中地区也是中国最著名的面孔大熊猫的家园。在南部，期待历史的面纱和柔和的美丽，游客比该地区其他地区少得多。在北边，面容再次变成了高山山谷和蓝绿色湖泊的仙境。当你向西冒险时，四川的西藏一面就会出现。这里是康区，前藏族州之一：广阔的高原草原和冰川山脉，藏族文化仍然蓬勃发展，您一定会拥有最具挑战性但最神奇的体验。

When to Go
何时去

March–May Prime time for Chengdu; not too humid, peach blossoms and little rain.
3 月至 5 月成都黄金时段;不太潮湿，桃花盛开，雨水少。

July & August In the west the warm grasslands bloom in technicolour and festivals abound; time for hiking in the mountains.
7 月和 8 月在西部，温暖的草原绽放着五彩缤纷的花朵，节日比比皆是;是时候在山上徒步旅行了。

September & October Turquoise glacial lakes in the west amid autumn leaves; summer heat of Chengdu begins to subside.
九月和十月西边绿松石色的冰川湖，秋叶中;成都的夏季炎热开始消退。

Sichuan Highlights
四川亮点

1 Yading Nature Reserve Making multiday pilgrimage treks around the stunning holy mountains.
1 亚丁自然保护区 在令人惊叹的圣山周围进行多日朝圣徒步旅行。

2 Tagong Striding across windswept grasslands and sleeping in Tibetan nomad tents.
2 塔公大步跨过狂风吹拂的草原，睡在藏族游牧的帐篷里。

3 Emei Shan Rising with the sun above the forested slopes at this cool, misty retreat.
3 峨眉山 随着太阳在这个凉爽、雾气缭绕的度假胜地的森林山坡上升起。

4 Giant Panda Breeding Research Base Meeting China’s cuddly national icon.
4 大熊猫繁育研究基地遇见中国可爱的民族标志。

5 Dzongsar Valley Exploring this beautiful valley dotted with ancient temples and home to thousands of monks.
5 宗沙山谷 探索这个美丽的山谷，那里点缀着古老的寺庙，是成千上万僧侣的家园。

6 Grand Buddha Peering over the toenails of the world’s largest Buddha statue in Le Shan.
6 大佛 凝视乐山世界上最大的佛像的脚趾甲。

7 Dzogchen Being dazzled by the scale of this monastery complex and then dazzled again by the epic mountain scenery.
7 大圆满被这座寺院建筑群的规模所震撼，然后又被史诗般的山景所震撼。

8 Four Sisters Mountain Hiking at the foot of Sichuan’s second-highest mountain and taking in the panorama from the top of the Haizi Valley.
8 四姐妹山 在四川第二高峰脚下徒步，从海子谷山顶欣赏全景。

History
历史

Sichuan’s early history was turbulent. The region was the site of various breakaway kingdoms, ever skirmishing with central authority, but it was finally wrested under control and established as the capital of the Qin empire in the 3rd century BC. It was here that the kingdom of Shu (a name by which the province is still known) ruled as an independent state during the Three Kingdoms period (AD 220–80).
四川的早期历史是动荡的。该地区是各个分离王国的所在地，经常与中央当局发生小规模冲突，但最终在公元前 3 世纪被控制并建立为秦帝国的首都。正是在这里，蜀国（该省仍然被称为该省的名称）在三国时期（公元 220-80 年）作为一个独立国家进行统治。

During the Warring States period (475–221 BC), local governor and famed engineer Li Bing managed to harness the flood-prone Min River (岷江, Mín Jiāng) on the Chuanxi plain with his revolutionary weir system; the Dujiangyan Irrigation Project still controls flooding, and supplies Chengdu and 49 other provincial cities with water 2200 years after it was constructed. It’s one of the reasons the Sichuan basin is synonymous with fertile soil.
战国时期（公元前 475-221 年），地方总督、著名工程师李冰用他革命的堰系统成功地利用了川西平原上多发洪水的岷江（岷江 ，Mín Jiāng）;都江堰灌溉工程至今仍控制着洪水，在建成 2200 年后仍为成都等 49 个省市供水。这也是四川盆地成为肥沃土壤代名词的原因之一。

Another more recent factor was the efforts of Zhao Ziyang, the Party Secretary of Sichuan in 1975. After the Great Leap Forward, when an estimated 10% of Sichuan’s population died of starvation, Ziyang became the driving force behind agricultural and economic reforms that restored farming output. He reinstated the ‘Responsibility System’, whereby plots of land were granted to farming families on the proviso that they sold a quota of crops to the state. Any additional profits or losses would be borne by the families. This household-focused approach was so successful that it became the national model. Sichuan continues to be a major producer of the nation’s grain, soybeans and pork.
另一个较新的因素是 1975 年四川省委书记赵紫阳的努力。大跃进运动后，四川估计有 10% 的人口死于饥饿，紫阳成为农业和经济改革的推动力，恢复了农业产量。他恢复了“责任制度”，即将土地授予农民家庭，但条件是他们向国家出售一定配额的农作物。任何额外的利润或损失将由家庭承担。这种以家庭为中心的方法非常成功，成为全国模式。四川仍然是全国粮食、大豆和猪肉的主要生产国。

Catastrophe struck the region on 12 May 2008, when the Wenchuan earthquake measuring 7.9 on the Richter scale hit the province’s central region. Some sources reported it killed more than 88,000 people, as many as 10,000 of them school children, and left millions more injured or homeless. The rebuilding effort cost over a trillion yuan and the destruction was so complete in some areas that it has taken many years for the work to be completed. The main road linking Chengdu with Jiuzhaigou took four years to reopen, and travellers on that route will now see that brand-new villages have risen from the rubble.
2008 年 5 月 12 日，汶川发生里氏 7.9 级地震，袭击了该省中部地区。一些消息来源报告说，它造成 88,000 多人死亡，其中多达 10,000 人是学童，并导致数百万人受伤或无家可归。重建工作耗资超过万亿元，部分地区破坏非常彻底，工程花了多年才完成。连接成都和九寨沟的主要道路花了四年时间才重新开放，这条路线上的旅行者现在将看到全新的村庄已经从废墟中拔地而起。

Earthquakes continue to rock the region on a regular basis. In mid 2019 a series of quakes hit the area around Yibin, causing a number of fatalities and structural damage.
地震继续定期震撼该地区。2019年年中，宜宾周边地区发生了一系列地震，造成多人死亡和结构损坏。

Language
语言

Sichuanese is a Mandarin dialect, but with its fast clip, distinctive syntax and five tones instead of four, it can challenge standard Mandarin speakers. Two phrases easily understood are yàodé (pronounced ‘yow-day’, meaning ‘yes’ or ‘OK’) and méidé (pronounced ‘may-day’, meaning ‘no’).
四川话是一种普通话方言，但凭借其快速剪辑、独特的语法和五声而不是四声，它可以挑战标准的普通话使用者。两个容易理解的短语是 yàodé（发音为“yow-day”，意思是“是”或“OK”）和 méidé（发音为“may-day”，意思是“不”）。

Sichuan’s other major languages belong to the Tibeto-Burman family and are spoken by Tibetans and Yi minorities. Don’t expect much help from standard phrasebooks. In western Sichuan, Tibetan dialects vary from region to region. Hiring a guide for this area makes sense, but ensure that they are a native Tibetan speaker rather than Chinese (many Chinese guides to the region don’t speak Tibetan).
四川的其他主要语言属于藏缅语系，藏族和彝族少数民族使用。不要指望标准短语手册能提供太多帮助。在川西地区，藏语方言因地区而异。为该地区聘请导游是有意义的，但要确保他们的母语是藏语而不是中文（该地区的许多中国导游不会说藏语）。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Chengdu serves as the province’s transit hub. Smooth expressways to many towns and cities near Chengdu as well as to parts of eastern and western Sichuan make for short trips to many destinations. There are no expressways in the north or west of Sichuan (though some are under construction) but all but the most minor roads – or those over the highest passes – are still in pretty good condition. Tunnels that bore straight through the heart of mountains have cut journey times considerably on main roads in the west. Weather conditions are unpredictable at high elevations, and hazards ranging from landslides to snow-blocked roads are common, although on main routes such obstacles tend to be cleared quickly.
成都是该省的交通枢纽。通往成都附近许多城镇以及四川东部和西部部分地区的高速公路畅通无阻，可短途前往许多目的地。四川北部或西部没有高速公路（尽管有些正在建设中），但除了最小的道路——或那些越过最高山口的道路——之外，所有道路的状况仍然相当良好。直穿山脉中心的隧道大大缩短了西部主要道路的行程时间。高海拔地区的天气条件是不可预测的，从山体滑坡到积雪堵塞的道路等危险很常见，尽管在主要路线上，这些障碍往往很快就会被清除。

Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport is the largest airport in southwest China. Numerous daily flights link Chengdu with most other large Chinese cities, as well as a number of international destinations.
成都双流国际机场是中国西南地区最大的机场。每天都有许多航班将成都与大多数其他中国大城市以及许多国际目的地连接起来。

Several small airports in Sichuan’s furthest corners are connected to Chengdu by one-hour flights — Jiuzhaigou in the north, Kangding in the near west, Daocheng-Yading in the southwest, and Yushu just across the western border with Qinghai province – significantly cutting travel times to these otherwise remote destinations.
四川最偏远角落的几个小型机场与成都有一小时的航班相连——北部的九寨沟、近西部的康定、西南部的稻城亚定，以及与青海省接壤的玉树——大大缩短了前往这些偏远目的地的旅行时间。

High-speed trains connect Chengdu to Qingcheng Shan and Dujiangyan in the north, Le Shan and Emei Shan in the south, and on to China’s other provinces in every direction.
高铁将成都与北至青城山和都江堰、南至乐山和峨眉山，以及中国其他省份的各个方向连接起来。

CENTRAL SICHUAN
四川中部

The province’s friendly and modern capital city, Chengdu, is where most travellers start their Sichuan explorations. It makes a great base for trips to the region’s top sights. The area surrounding this emerging metropolis remains dotted with quaint old villages and farmsteads. Nearby rise the lush, forested and scarred peaks of Emei Shan, the cliffs of Le Shan with its massive ancient Buddha, and, hidden in the bamboo thickets, pandas; practically impossible to see in the wild, they are easy to spot in the area’s reserve enclosures. This combination of buzzing urbanity, big-ticket attractions and peaceful rural idyll make for a great introduction to southern China.
该省友好而现代化的首府成都是大多数游客开始四川探索的地方。酒店是前往该地区顶级景点的理想下榻之地。这座新兴大都市的周围地区仍然点缀着古色古香的古老村庄和农庄。附近耸立着峨眉山郁郁葱葱、森林繁茂、伤痕累累的山峰，乐山的悬崖和巨大的古佛，以及隐藏在竹丛中的熊猫;在野外几乎不可能看到它们，在该地区的保护区围栏中很容易发现它们。繁华的都市风情、高价景点和宁静的乡村田园风光相结合，是中国南方的绝佳入门之选。

Chengdu 成都
Chengdu 成都

%028 / Pop 14.42 million
% 028 / 人口 1442 万

Chengdu (Chéngdū) is no great draw when it comes to major tourist sites, yet this is one of the few supersized Chinese cities that most visitors do end up enjoying. There’s a relaxing teahouse culture – favourite local institutions have been serving the same brews for generations; a lively nightlife that mixes craft-beer bars and superhip clubs with Sichuan opera shows; and delicious food that is famous for its heat, history and variety even in cuisine-rich China, and very much a point of pride: Chengdu is, after all, Unesco’s first-ever City of Gastronomy. As if that’s not enough, this is the place to come to see China’s cutest faces – the giant pandas.
成都（Chéngdū）在主要旅游景点方面并不吸引人，但它是大多数游客最终都会喜欢的为数不多的中国超大型城市之一。这里有一种轻松的茶馆文化——最受欢迎的当地机构几代人都供应相同的啤酒;热闹的夜生活，将精酿啤酒吧和超级潮流俱乐部与川剧表演融为一体;以及以其热度、历史和多样性而闻名的美味佳肴，即使在美食丰富的中国也是如此，并且非常引以为豪：毕竟，成都是联合国教科文组织有史以来第一个美食之都。似乎这还不够，这里是来看看中国最可爱面孔的地方——大熊猫。

Chengdu is the transport hub for the entire region and most travellers in China’s southwest pass through this way at some point. Just make sure you don’t rush your visit.
成都是整个地区的交通枢纽，中国西南地区的大多数游客都会经过这条路。只要确保你不要急于访问。

1Sights
1 景点

oGiant Panda Breeding Research BaseZOO
o 大熊猫繁育研究基地 ZOO

(大熊猫繁育基地, Dàxióngmāo Fányù Jīdì; %028 8351 0033; www.panda.org.cn; 1375 Xiongmao Dadao, 熊猫大道1375号; adult/student ¥55/27; h7.30am-6pm May-Oct, to 5pm Nov-Apr; mPanda Avenue)
（ 大熊猫繁育基地 ， Dàxióngmāo Fányù Jīdì; % 028 8351 0033;www.panda.org.cn;1375 熊猫大道 1375 号 ;成人/学生 ¥55/27; h 5 月至 10 月上午 7：30 至下午 6 点，11 月至 4 月下午 5 点; m 熊猫大道）

One of Chengdu’s most popular attractions, this panda park 18km north of the city centre is the easiest way to glimpse Sichuan’s most famous residents. Don’t, however, make the mistake of thinking you’ll be seeing wild pandas. They are kept in large enclosures and have a dedicated team of scientists and keepers tending to their every need. As well as living, breathing pandas, there are some fascinating panda information centres and museums explaining panda conservation and husbandry.
这个熊猫公园位于市中心以北 18 公里处，是成都最受欢迎的景点之一，是了解四川最著名的居民的最简单方式。但是，不要错误地认为您会看到野生熊猫。它们被饲养在大型围栏中，并有一支由科学家和饲养员组成的专业团队来满足它们的每一个需求。除了活生生的、会呼吸的熊猫外，还有一些迷人的大熊猫信息中心和博物馆 ，解释大熊猫的保护和饲养。

Home to nearly 120 giant and 76 red pandas, the base focuses on getting these notoriously love-shy creatures to breed and has been remarkably successful at it. March to May is the ‘falling in love period’ (wink wink). If you visit during summer or autumn, you may see tiny newborns in the nursery incubators.
该基地是近 120 只大熊猫和 76 只小熊猫的家园，专注于让这些臭名昭著的害羞的生物繁殖，并在这方面取得了巨大的成功。三月至五月是“坠入爱河期”（眨眼）。如果您在夏季或秋季访问，您可能会在托儿所保温箱中看到小新生儿。

Try to visit in the morning, when the pandas are most active. Feeding takes place around opening time at 8am, although you’ll see them eating in the late afternoon, too. Pandas spend most of their afternoons sleeping, particularly during the height of midsummer, when they sometimes disappear into their (air-conditioned) living quarters, though some of these have public viewing areas.
尽量在早上大熊猫最活跃的时候参观。喂食在早上 8 点开放时间左右进行，但您也会在下午晚些时候看到它们进食。大熊猫下午的大部分时间都在睡觉，尤其是在盛夏时节，它们有时会消失在（有空调的）生活区，尽管其中一些有公共观赏区。

At the best of times, it can be very busy. At weekends you’ll be lucky to spot a panda through the swarms of humans.
在最好的时候，它可能会非常繁忙。周末，您会很幸运地在成群结队的人类中发现一只熊猫。

From exit A of the Panda Avenue (熊猫大道) station on metro line 3 , a free D025 bus transfer is available from 8.30am to 4pm. A taxi from the city centre costs about ¥50, or hostels run trips here. There are also various dedicated buses from the city centre to the gates of the research base. The Panda Bus is one such company and it charges ¥10 from the Wide and Narrow Alley, the Wenshu Monastery and various other locations.
从地铁 3 号线熊猫大道站 A 出口出发，上午 8 点 30 分至下午 4 点提供免费的 D025 巴士接送服务。从市中心乘坐出租车大约需要 50 日元，或者旅馆在这里提供行程。从市中心到研究基地门口也有各种专用巴士。 熊猫巴士就是这样一家公司，从宽窄巷、文殊寺和其他各个地点收费 10 日元。

Pandas in Chengdu | KISZON PASCAL/GETTY IMAGES ©
成都的熊猫 |基松·帕斯卡/盖蒂图片社 ©

oChengdu MuseumMUSEUM
o 成都博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 成都博物馆, Chéngdū Bówùguǎn; %028 6291 5593; www.cdmuseum.com; west side of Tianfu Sq, 天府广场西侧; h9am-8.30pm Tue-Sun May-Oct, to 8pm Nov-Apr; mTianfu Square) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 成都博物馆 ，Chéngdū Bówùguǎn; % 028 6291 5593;www.cdmuseum.com;天府广场 h 西侧，5 月至 10 月周二至周日上午 9 时至晚上 8 时 30 分，11 月至 4 月晚上 8 时 ; m 天府广场） F

Spanning ancient Shu and pre-Qin dynasties to the Revolutionary era and modern Chengdu, this spectacular five-storey museum (completed in 2016) is packed with historical and cultural relics of the city’s past. Don’t miss the two ‘Puppetry and Shadow Plays of China’ galleries on the top floor, with excellent examples of the art from across the country. There are also some interesting temporary exhibitions in the basement. Signage is in English. Bring a passport for entry.
这座壮观的五层博物馆（于 2016 年竣工）横跨古蜀、先秦、革命时代和现代成都，里面陈列着这座城市过去的历史和文化文物。不要错过位于顶层的两个“中国木偶戏和皮影戏”画廊，这里有来自全国各地的优秀艺术典范。地下室还有一些有趣的临时展览。标牌是英文的。携带护照入境。

oWenshu MonasteryBUDDHIST TEMPLE
o 文殊寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map Google map; 文殊院, Wénshū Yuàn; 66 Wenshuyuan Lu, 文殊院路66号; h7am-9pm; mWenshu Monastery) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 文殊院 ，Wénshū Yuàn;文殊院路 66 号 h 7am-9pm; m 文殊寺） F

This Tang dynasty monastery is dedicated to Wenshu (Manjushri), the Bodhisattva of Wisdom, and is Chengdu’s largest and best-preserved Buddhist temple. The air is heavy with incense and the low murmur of chanting; despite frequent crowds of worshippers, there’s still a sense of serenity and solitude. At weekends free Chinese- and English-language tours of the complex run frequently. Look for the stand advertising them inside the main courtyard.
这座唐代寺院供奉着智慧菩萨文殊菩萨，是成都最大、保存最完好的佛教寺庙。空气中弥漫着浓浓的香火和低沉的吟诵声;尽管礼拜者经常涌入，但仍然有一种宁静和孤独的感觉。周末，该综合体的免费中文和英文游经常运行。寻找主庭院内的广告摊位。

Chengdu Art GalleryGALLERY
成都美术馆 GALLERY

(map Google map; 成都市美术馆, Chéngdū Shì Měishùguǎn; %028 8663 3667, 028 8627 5483; www.cdcaa.net; 80 Xiatongren Lu, 下同仁路80号; h9am-5pm Tue-Sun; mWide and Narrow Alley) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 成都市美术馆 ， Chéngdū Shì Měishùguǎn; % 028 8663 3667、028 8627 5483;www.cdcaa.net;80 Xiatongren Lu， 下同仁路 80 号 h 9am-5pm Tue-Sun; m 宽窄巷） F

Rotating exhibitions of classical-style Chinese art in a traditionally styled courtyard building that’s almost as artistic as the paintings within. It’s a real haven of calm from the frenetic crowds on the Wide and Narrow Alley pedestrian streets you take to access it.
在传统风格的庭院建筑中轮流展出中国古典风格的艺术作品，几乎与里面的画作一样具有艺术性。这是一个真正的平静天堂，远离您进入的宽窄巷步行街上狂热的人群。

Sichuan MuseumMUSEUM
四川博物院 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 四川博物院; Sìchuān Bówùyuàn; %028 6552 1888, 028 6552 1569; www.scmuseum.cn; 5 Huanqing Hualu, 浣青华路5号; h9am-9pm Tue-Sun May-Oct, to 8pm Nov-Apr; g19, 82, 165) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 四川博物院 ;Sìchuān Bówùyuàn; % 028 6552 1888、028 6552 1569;www.scmuseum.cn;5 浣青华路 5 号 h 5 月至 10 月周二至周日上午 9 时至晚上 9 时，11 月至 4 月至晚上 8 时; g 19、82、165） F

Aficionados of Chinese history will enjoy a stop here for a look at Sichuan’s past through Shu-era calligraphy and painting, bronze works and ceramics, and a nice gallery of Buddha statues unearthed during archaeological works at the Ming dynasty Wanfo Temple (万佛寺). The hall focusing on the region’s ethnic minorities is also fascinating (even more so if you’re heading west to Tibet). Most signage is in English. Bring your passport for entry.
中国历史爱好者可以在这里停留，通过蜀代书画、青铜器和陶瓷，以及明代万佛寺考古工作中出土的精美佛像画廊，了解四川的过去。以该地区少数民族为重点的大厅也令人着迷（如果您要向西前往西藏，则更是如此）。大多数标牌都是英文的。带上护照入境。

Jinsha Site MuseumMUSEUM
金沙遗址博物馆 MUSEUM

(金沙遗址博物馆, Jīnshā Yízhǐ Bówùguǎn; %028 8730 3522; www.jinshasitemuseum.com; 227 Qingyang Dadao, 青羊大道227号; ¥70; h8.30am-8pm Tue-Sun May-Oct, to 6.30pm Nov-Apr; also Mon Jan-Feb & Jul-Aug; mJinsha Site Museum)
（ 金沙遗址博物馆 ， Jīnshā Yízhǐ Bówùguǎn; % 028 8730 3522;www.jinshasitemuseum.com;227 青羊大道， 青羊大道 227 号 ; ¥70; h 5 月至 10 月周二至周日上午 8：30 至晚上 8：30,11 月至 4 月至下午 6：30;以及周一、1 月至 2 月和 7 月至 8 月; m 金沙遗址博物馆）

In 2001 archaeologists made a historic discovery in Chengdu’s western suburbs: they unearthed a major site containing ruins of the 3000-year-old Shu kingdom. This excellent, expansive museum includes the excavation site and beautiful displays of many of the uncovered objects, which were created between 1200 and 600 BC.
2001年，考古学家在成都西郊有了一个历史性的发现：他们发掘了一个包含3000年蜀国遗址的主要遗址。这座优秀、广阔的博物馆包括发掘现场和许多未被发现的物品的精美展示，这些物品创建于公元前 1200 年至 600 年之间。

The 6000 or so relics here include both functional and decorative items, from pottery and tools to jade artefacts, stone carvings and ornate gold masks. A large number of elephant tusks were also unearthed here.
这里的 6000 多件文物包括功能性和装饰性物品，从陶器和工具到玉器、石雕和华丽的金面具。这里还出土了大量的象牙。

Use exit C of the Jinsha Site Museum station on metro line 7; the ticket office is about 400m north.
使用地铁 7 号线金沙遗址博物馆站 C 出口;售票处位于北约 400 米处。

An audio guide (in English) is ¥10 with a ¥200 deposit.
语音导览（英语）费用为 10 日元，押金为 200 日元。

Wuhiu TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
乌休寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map Google map; 武侯祠, Wǔhóu Cí; %028 8555 2397; www.wuhouci.net.cn; 231 Wuhouci Dajie, 武侯祠大街231号; adult/student ¥50/25; h8am-8pm May-Oct, to 6.30pm Nov-Apr; g1, 21, 26)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 武侯祠 ，Wǔhóu Cí; % 028 8555 2397;www.wuhouci.net.cn; 武侯祠大街 231 号 ;成人/学生 50/25 日元; h 5 月至 10 月上午 8 点至晚上 8 点，11 月至 4 月至下午 6 点 30 分; g 1、21、26）

Located adjacent to Nanjiao Park and surrounded by mossy cypresses, this temple (rebuilt in 1672) honours several figures from the Three Kingdoms period, namely legendary military strategist Zhuge Liang and Emperor Liu Bei (his tomb is here). Both were immortalised in the Chinese literature classic, Romance of the Three Kingdoms (Sān Guó Yǎnyì).
这座寺庙（1672 年重建）毗邻南郊公园，周围环绕着长满苔藓的柏树，供奉着三国时期的几位人物，即传奇军事家诸葛亮和刘备皇帝（他的坟墓就在这里）。两人都在中国文学经典《 三国演义 》（Sān Guó Yǎnyì）中永垂不朽。

Qingyang TempleTAOIST TEMPLE
青阳寺道观

(map Google map; 青羊宫, Qīngyáng Gōng; 9 Huanlu Xi Er Duan, 一环路西二段9号; ¥10; h8am-6pm; g11, 27, 45)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 青羊宫 ，Qīngyáng Gōng;9 Huanlu 习二段， 一环路西二段 9 号 ; ¥10; h 上午 8 点至下午 6 点; g 11、27、45）

Alongside Culture Park map Google map (文化公园, Wénhuà Gōngyuán; h6am-10pm; c) F, this is Chengdu’s oldest and most extensive Taoist temple. Qingyang (Green Ram) Temple dates from the Zhou dynasty, although most of what you see is Qing. A highlight is the unusually squat, eight-sided pagoda, built without bolts or pegs. There’s also a popular teahouse (tea from ¥10) inside towards the back.
文化公园地图旁边 Google map（ 文化公园 ，Wénhuà Gōngyuán; h 早上 6 点至晚上 10 点; c ） F ，这是成都最古老、规模最广的道观。青羊（绿羊）寺的历史可以追溯到周代，尽管您看到的大部分都是清朝的。一个亮点是异常矮小的八面宝塔，没有螺栓或钉子。里面还有一家受欢迎的茶馆（茶 10 日元起）。

People’s ParkPARK
人民公园 PARK

(map Google map; 人民公园, Rénmín Gōngyuán; 9 Citang Jie, 祠堂街9号; h6.30am-10pm; mPeople’s Park) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 人民公园 ，Rénmín Gōngyuán;9 Citang Jie， 祠堂街 9 号 h 6.30am-10pm; m 人民公园） F

On weekends, locals fill this park with dancing, song and taichi. There’s a small, willowtree-lined boating lake and a number of teahouses: He Ming Teahouse is the most popular and atmospheric.
周末，当地人会在这个公园里跳舞、唱歌和太极拳。这里有一个柳树成荫的小划船湖和许多茶馆： 何明茶馆是最受欢迎和大气的。

2 活动

oLost PlateFOOD
o 丢失的盘子食物

(%156 9210 9030; www.lostplate.com; adult/child from US$55/25)
（ % 156 9210 9030;www.lostplate.com;成人/儿童 55/25 美元起）

Lost Plate offers 3½-hour insider food tours that really give you an insight into Chengdu’s dining scene. The evening tour takes in four or five eating experiences reached by tuk-tuk or foot, and includes unlimited food and beer.
Lost Plate 提供 3 小时半的内部美食之旅，真正让您深入了解成都的餐饮场景。晚上的游览将提供四到五次通过嘟嘟车或步行到达的饮食体验，包括无限量的食物和啤酒。

Locations visited are hyperlocal: you might be asked to crawl into an apartment-complex restaurant through a window or nibble on street-vendor snacks, all of which represent the city’s favourite foods. The guides are also locals and have vetted all of the dining experiences personally, and offer plenty of historical and cultural insights along the way.
参观的地点是超本地化的：你可能会被要求从窗户爬进公寓大楼的餐厅，或者啃街头小吃，所有这些都是这座城市最受欢迎的食物。导游也是当地人，亲自审查了所有的用餐体验，并沿途提供了大量的历史和文化见解。

oChengdu Food ToursFOOD

(%151 1402 7611; www.chengdufoodtours.com; per person ¥400)

Jordan and his team of knowledgeable and enthusiastic guides share their passion for Chengdu’s food culture on afternoon excursions that visit neighborhood markets and stop in to sample some of the city’s most iconic dishes. Custom itineraries are also available.
乔丹和他的知识渊博、热情的导游团队在下午的短途旅行中分享他们对成都饮食文化的热情，参观附近的市场，并停下来品尝这座城市一些最具标志性的菜肴。还提供定制行程。

优秀的旅馆，针对豪华的包装客而不是背包客。原始宿舍设有私人浴室，最多只有六张床，而私人房间铺有精美的瓷砖，与许多酒店房间一样好。这里有一个很酷的街边木制露台、大量的旅行设施、建议和旅游、美味的西式早餐和会说英语的工作人员。

Excellent facilities, great coffee, lots of common space – this artsy hostel with bright, ‘building-block’ furnishings and spotless bathrooms has it all. 一流的设施、美味的咖啡、大量的公共空间——这家充满艺术气息的旅馆拥有明亮的“积木”家具和一尘不染的浴室，应有尽有。它足够大，在宿舍楼层感觉有点制度化，但这只是意味着可以结交大量的新朋友。在珠峰酒店入口内寻找它。

Nova Traveller’s LodgeHOSTEL¥
Nova Traveller's LodgeHOSTEL¥

(map Google map; 成都乐浮国际青年旅舍, Chéngdū Lèfú Guójì Qīngnián Lǚshě; %028 8695 0016; www.dragontown.com.cn; 10 Taisheng Beilu, 太升北路10号; dm from ¥55, r ¥148-218; aW; mSouth Taisheng Rd)

Clean, bright and quiet; the staff here make the collection of good facilities into a truly warm hostel. Standard private rooms are on the small side, so upgrade to one of the spacier deluxe rooms. There are frequent movie nights, a range of day trips and an inviting alfresco cafe, plus the staff speak superb English.
干净、明亮、安静;这里的工作人员将良好的设施汇集成一个真正温馨的旅馆。标准私人房间偏小，因此请升级到更宽敞的豪华客房之一。这里经常举办电影之夜、一系列一日游和温馨的露天咖啡馆，而且工作人员的英语一流。

Holly’s HostelHOSTEL¥
霍莉青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥

Prepare for trips out west by plugging yourself in to Chengdu’s small Tibetan district, which surrounds this welcoming hostel. Staff can also help with permits to Lhasa.
为西部旅行做好准备，前往成都的藏区，该区环绕着这家温馨的旅舍。Holly's 拥有明亮、舒适的四到六床宿舍，还有会说英语的工作人员、自行车租赁服务（20 日元）和一个漂亮的屋顶咖啡馆（西式和中式主菜 10 至 50 日元）。工作人员还可以帮助办理前往拉萨的许可证。

oXishu Garden InnHOSTEL¥¥

5Eating
5 吃

Given that Chengdu has reportedly the highest density of restaurants and teahouses of any city in the world, and is the first city in Asia to be named a Unesco City of Gastronomy, your most memorable moments here are likely to involve food.
据报道，成都的餐馆和茶馆密度是世界上最高的城市，并且是亚洲第一个被联合国教科文组织评为美食之都的城市，您在这里最难忘的时刻可能与美食有关。

Several temples, including Wenshu Monastery, have popular vegetarian restaurants that are generally open only for lunch.
包括文殊寺在内的几座寺庙都有受欢迎的素食餐厅，通常只在午餐时间营业。

oDòng Zǐ Kou Zhāng Lǎo Èr Liáng FěnNOODLES¥

(map Google map; 洞子口张老二凉粉; 39 Wenshuyuan Lu, 文殊院路39号; mains ¥12; h8.30am-7.30pm AprOct, to 6.30pm Nov-Mar; mWenshu)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 洞子口张老二凉粉 ;39 Wenshuyuan Lu， 文殊院路 39 号 ;主菜¥12; h 4 月 10 月上午 8 时 30 分至晚上 7 时 30 分，11 月至 3 月至下午 6 时 30 分; m 文书）

A city classic that’s always packed at lunchtime, but just squeeze onto the end of one of the benches and tuck into the house special: tián shuĭ miàn, which is a tongue-tingling, mind-blowing bowl of thick, sugary noodles in a spicy sauce. Try it once and you’ll come back day after day.
午餐时间总是挤满了人，但只需挤在其中一张长凳的末端，塞进房子的特色菜：tián shuĭ miàn，这是一碗令人舌头发麻、令人兴奋的粗面条，配上辣酱。尝试一次，你就会日复一日地回来。

Lao Ma Rabbit HeadSICHUAN¥¥

SICHUAN FOOD
四川美食

Sichuan food is one of the four great regional Chinese cuisines, with famously spicy dishes that keep diners warm in the cold, damp winters and sweating in the hot, humid summers. From a ¥10 bowl of dāndan noodles (noodles served with preserved vegetables in a spicy sauce) to a multicourse family feast or a bubbling vat of hotpot, the variety in Sichuan is nearly endless and the heat is unrelenting.
川菜是中国四大地方美食之一，以辛辣著称的菜肴，让食客在寒冷潮湿的冬天保持温暖，在炎热潮湿的夏天出汗。从一碗 10 日元的担担面（配上辣酱腌制蔬菜的面条）到多道菜的家庭盛宴或一桶冒泡的火锅，四川的品种几乎是无穷无尽的，而且炎热无情。

A Huǒguō (火锅) Hotpot; more a food style than a dish – a boiling vat of spicy (or not) oil cooks all manner of meat, veggies, intestines and more.
A 火锅火锅;与其说是一道菜，不如说是一种食物风格——一桶沸腾的辛辣（或不辣）油可以烹饪各种肉类、蔬菜、肠子等。

A Gōngbào jīdīng (宫爆鸡丁) Spicy chicken with peanuts.
A 宫爆鸡丁 花生辣鸡。

A Gānbiān sìjìdòu (干煸四季豆) Dry-fried green beans.
A Gānbiān sìjìdòu （ 干煸四季豆 ） 干炒青豆。

A Mápó dòufu (麻婆豆腐) Spicy beancurd ‘invented’ by a pock-marked woman.
A 麻婆豆腐 麻婆豆腐 由一个麻子女人“发明”的辣豆腐。

A Shuǐzhǔ yú (水煮鱼) Boiled fish in a fiery sauce.
A Shuǐzhǔ yú （ 水煮鱼 ） 用火辣酱煮鱼。

A Huíguō ròu (回锅肉) Pork, simmered with spices and then stir-fried.
A 回锅肉 猪肉，用香料炖煮，然后炒。

A Yúxiāng qiézi (鱼香茄子) Sliced eggplant, simmered in a sweet/sour/spicy sauce.
A 鱼香茄子 茄子切片，用甜/酸/辣酱炖。

A Dàndàn miàn (担担面) Pickled veggies, minced pork, chilli and green onions over a bowl of noodles.
A Dàndàn miàn （ 担担面 ） 将腌制蔬菜、猪肉末、辣椒和大葱放在一碗面条上。

A Máyóujī (麻油鸡) Sesame-oil chicken.
A 麻油鸡 芝麻油鸡。

A Chuānběi liángfěn (川北凉粉) The local take on a national favourite: mung-bean noodles served cold and drowning in spices.
A 川北凉粉 （Chuānběi liángfěn） 当地人对全国最爱的改造：绿豆面条冷食，浸泡在香料中。

6Drinking & Nightlife
6 饮酒与夜生活

Sichuan does teahouses better than anywhere else in China, and an afternoon in a leafy park’s teahouse is a quintessential experience. Chengdu has plenty of options for the harder stuff too, including raucous bar strips but also craft-beer joints, refined cocktail bars and upmarket clubs.
四川的茶馆比中国其他任何地方都好，在绿树成荫的公园的茶馆度过一个下午是一种典型的体验。成都也有很多选择，包括喧闹的酒吧，还有精酿啤酒店、精致的鸡尾酒吧和高档俱乐部。

For the latest on Chengdu’s nightlife, check out More Chengdu (www.morechengdu.com).
有关成都夜生活的最新信息，请查看更多成都 （www.morechengdu.com）。

oHe Ming TeahouseTEAHOUSE
o 何明茶馆 TEAHOUSE

(map Google map; 鹤鸣茶馆, Hèmíng Cháguǎn; People’s Park, 人民公园; h9am-8pm; mPeople’s Park)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 鹤鸣茶馆 ，Hèmíng Cháguǎn;人民公园， 人民公园 h 9am-8pm; m 人民公园）

Always lively, this century-old spot is the most famous teahouse in Chengdu and the ideal place to fritter away an afternoon with a bottomless cup of tea (¥13 to ¥30) and a view over the endlessly absorbing park life. Neat tea-pouring performances can be organised for ¥280. Ear cleanings (¥20) available daily.
这个拥有百年历史的茶馆总是热闹非凡，是成都最著名的茶馆，也是享用一杯无底茶（13 至 30 日元）并欣赏无尽引人入胜的公园生活的理想场所。可以组织整洁的倒茶表演，费用为 280 日元。每天提供耳朵清洁服务（20 日元）。

oKǎi Lú Lǎo Zhái CháyuánTEAHOUSE
o Kǎi Lú Lǎo Zhái Cháyuán 茶馆

(map Google map; 庐恺老宅茶园; %180 3041 6632; 11 Kuan Xiangzi, 宽巷子11号; h10am-10pm; W; mWide & Narrow Alley)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 庐恺老宅茶园 % 180 3041 6632;宽巷子 h 11 号 10am-10pm; W m 宽窄巷）

For 200 years, one of the city’s most venerable teahouses has been tucked away in a peaceful courtyard behind a stone archway off frenetic Kuan Alley, the distant hum of which is more than countered by the sound of zither music that plays in the background. These days there’s wi-fi, but that seems to be about all that has changed. Tea from ¥48; snacks ¥12.
200 年来，这座城市最古老的茶馆之一一直隐藏在狂热的关巷旁一座石拱门后面的一个宁静的庭院中，远处的嗡嗡声被背景音乐的古筝音乐所抵消。现在有了 Wi-Fi，但这似乎就是所有变化。茶 48 日元起;小吃 12 日元。

Let’s GrindCOFFEE
让我们研磨咖啡

(map Google map; %181 1163 4646; 39 Jiangtingtang Bajie, 江亭镗钯街39号; h8am-7pm; W; mChunxi Rd)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; % 181 1163 4646; 江亭镗钯街 h 江亭八戒 39 号 8am-7pm; W m 春熙路）

In-the-know locals call this some of the best coffee in Chengdu, and we’re inclined to agree. It certainly has the best selection of brews we’ve seen in town, and the beans are roasted locally and ground fresh for each cup.
知情的当地人称这是成都最好的咖啡之一，我们倾向于同意。它当然拥有我们在城里见过的最好的啤酒选择，而且咖啡豆都是在当地烘焙的，每杯咖啡都是新鲜研磨的。

Funky TownBAR
时髦小镇酒吧

(map Google map; 时髦的小镇, Shímáo De Xiǎo Zhèn; %0182 8005 9632; www.facebook.com/FunkyTownChengdu; 58-3 North Kehua Lu, 北科华路58-3号; h7pm-2am; mNijiaqiao)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 时髦的小镇 ，Shímáo De Xiǎo Zhèn; % 0182 8005 9632;www.facebook.com/FunkyTownChengdu; 北科华路北科华路 58-3 号 h 7pm-2am; m 倪家桥）

Tiny, hole-in-the-wall bar where three people constitute a full house. There’s a single sofa inside and a table and couple of chairs on the pavement outside, and the whole thing is held together by skateboard and street art stickers and attitude. The best part of it is that people can bring along any vinyl they like and they’ll play it.
小小的、破洞的酒吧，三个人组成了一个满座的房子。里面有一张沙发，外面的人行道上有一张桌子和几把椅子，整个东西都是用滑板和街头艺术贴纸和态度结合在一起的。最好的部分是人们可以带上他们喜欢的任何黑胶唱片，他们会播放它。

Wild West TaproomCRAFT BEER
狂野西部酒吧精酿啤酒

(map Google map; 美西啤酒, Měixī Píjiǔ; %028 8557 8927; 30 Zhangwu Jie, off Jinli Guije, 章武街30号; h9am-midnight; g1, 21, 26)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 美西啤酒 ，Měixī Píjiǔ; % 028 8557 8927;章武街 30 号，金里归济对开， 章武街 30 号 h 9am-midnight; g 1、21、26）

Sample some (or perhaps all) of this Chengdu-based brewer’s eleven different ales at its taproom off Jinli Gujie. The four- to 10-glass samplers are particularly good value and the potato wedges go with it all very nicely.
在金里古街附近的酒吧品尝这家成都酿酒商的 11 种不同啤酒中的部分（或全部）。4 到 10 杯采样器特别超值，土豆角与这一切搭配得非常好。

Nanmen Craft BreweryCRAFT BEER
南门精酿啤酒厂 CRAFT BEER

(map Google map; 南门精酿, Nánmén Jīngniàng; %028 8508 2366; 7 Tongzilin Lu, 桐梓林路7号; h5pm-2am; mTongzilin)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 南门精酿 ，Nánmén Jīngniàng; % 028 8508 2366;桐梓林路 7 号 h 5pm-2am; m 桐梓林）

Craft beer, a convivial atmosphere and an eye-catching bar built around the brewing vats and equipment combine for a great thirst-quenching stop in Tongzilin. Sidle up to the bar and ask a bartender to help you find your personal preference of the numerous house brews, or choose from the wide menu of Chinese speciality beers.
精酿啤酒、欢乐的氛围以及围绕酿造桶和设备而建的引人注目的酒吧相结合，在桐梓林解渴。闲逛到酒吧，请调酒师帮助您找到您对众多自酿啤酒的个人喜好，或者从丰富的中国特色啤酒菜单中进行选择。

3Entertainment
3 娱乐

Chengdu is the birthplace of Sichuan opera, which dates back more than 250 years. Besides glass-shattering songs, performances feature slapstick, martial arts, men singing as women, acrobatics and even fire breathing. An undoubted highlight is biànliǎn (变脸; face changing), where performers change character in a blink by swapping masks, manipulating face paint and other conjuring tricks performed as entertainment.
成都是川剧的发源地，其历史可以追溯到 250 多年前。除了玻璃破碎的歌曲外，表演还包括闹剧、武术、男扮女唱、杂技，甚至喷火。毫无疑问，一个亮点是变脸 ，表演者通过交换面具、纵面部彩绘和其他作为娱乐表演的魔术，在眨眼间改变角色。

oNU SpaceLIVE MUSIC
o NU Space 现场音乐表演

(map Google map; 纽空间, Niǔ Kōngjiān; %028 8746 1983; www.facebook.com/nuspacechengdu; 9 Kuixinglou Jie, 奎星楼街9号; concerts ¥120-200; h9am-10pm Sun-Thu, to 11pm Fri & Sat; mWide & Narrow Alley)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 纽空间 ，Niǔ Kōngjiān; % 028 8746 1983;www.facebook.com/nuspacechengdu; 奎星楼街 9 号，奎星楼街 9 号 ;演唱会¥120-200; h 周日至周四上午 9 点至晚上 10 点，周五和周六至晚上 11 点; m 宽窄巷）

This combination cafe, bookshop, gallery and performance space at the head of delightfully hip Kuixinglou Jie makes a nice stop to unwind after the overenthusiastic crowds of Wide and Narrow Alley, or to get pumped up by touring domestic and foreign artists from a wide range of genres. Check its Facebook page for show dates and timing.
这个集咖啡馆、书店、画廊和表演于一体的空间位于令人愉悦的时髦奎兴楼街的顶端，是宽窄巷过度热情的人群之后放松身心的好地方，或者通过巡回演出各种流派的国内外艺术家来振作起来。查看其 Facebook 页面了解演出日期和时间。

oShǔfēng YǎyùnCHINESE OPERA
o 顺风云中国戏曲

(map Google map; 蜀风雅韵; %028 8776 4530; www.cdsfyy.com; Culture Park, 文化公园内面; tickets ¥140-320; hticket office 3-9.30pm, nightly shows 8-9.30pm; c; mTonghuimen)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 蜀风雅韵 % 028 8776 4530;www.cdsfyy.com;文化公园， 文化公园内面 ;门票¥140-320; h 售票处下午 3 点至 9 点 30 分，每晚演出晚上 8 点至 9 点 30 分; c m 同惠门）

This famous century-old theatre and teahouse puts on excellent 1½-hour shows that include music, puppetry and Sichuan opera’s famed fire breathing and face changing. Come at around 7.15pm to watch performers putting on their elaborate make-up and costumes. For ¥50 to ¥100, kids (and adults) can try on garb and have a costume artist paint their face.
这家著名的百年历史剧院和茶馆上演了 1 小时半的精彩表演，包括音乐、木偶戏和川剧著名的喷火和变脸。晚上 7 点 15 分左右来观看表演者化妆和服装。只需 50 日元至 100 日元，儿童（和成人）就可以试穿服装，并让服装师为他们的脸彩绘。

At weekends it sometimes stages an additional 3pm performance.
在周末，它有时会在下午 3 点额外上演一场演出。

7Shopping
7 购物

Fancy-pants shopping centres dot the city, with the highest concentration around the Chunxi Lu Shopping District map Google map (春熙路步行街, Chūnxīlù Bùxíngjiē; mChunxi Rd) east of Tianfu Sq. For traditional Tibetan shopping options, try the shops in the Tibetan neighbourhood southeast of Wuhou Temple. Outdoor enthusiasts gearing up for mountain trips should head to Sanfo Outdoors map Google map (三夫户外, Sānfū Hùwài; %028 8507 9586; www.sanfo.com; 243 Wuhouci Dajie, 武侯祠大街243号; h10am-8pm; mGaoshengqiao) or Decathlon (迪卡侬运动超市, Díkǎnóng Yùndòng Chāoshì; %028 8531 0388; www.decathlon.com.cn; 199 Duhui Lu, 都会路199号; h10am-10pm; mSouth Train Station).
花哨的购物中心遍布城市，春熙路购物区地图 Google map（ 春熙路步行街 ，Chūnxīlù Bùxíngjiē; m 春熙路） 天府广场以东。如果想选择传统的藏族购物，可以尝试武侯祠东南部藏族街区的商店。准备山地旅行的户外运动爱好者应该前往三佛户外地图 Google map（ 三夫户外 ， Sānfū Hùwài; % 028 8507 9586;www.sanfo.com; 武侯祠大街 h 243 号 10am-8pm; m 高胜桥） 或迪卡侬运动超市 ，Díkǎnóng Yùndòng Chāoshì; % 028 8531 0388;www.decathlon.com.cn;199 Duhui Lu， 都会路 199 号 h 10am-10pm; m 南火车站）。

8Information
8 信息

HEALTH
健康

Global Doctor Chengdu Clinic (环球医生, Huánqiú Yīshēng; %028 8522 6058, 24hr emergency 139 8225 6966; 2nd fl, 9-11 Lippo Tower, 62 Kehua Beilu, 科华北路62号力宝大夏2层9-11号; h9am-6pm Mon-Sat; mNijiaqiao) English- and Chinese-speaking doctors and a 24-hour emergency line; staff can even make house visits.
环球医生成都诊所 （ 环球医生 ，Huánqiú Yīshēng; % 028 8522 6058,24 小时紧急电话 139 8225 6966;科华北路科华北路 62 号力宝大夏 2 层 9-11 号 9-11 号 h 9am-6pm 周一至周六 ; m 倪家桥） 会说中英文的医生和 24 小时急诊热线;工作人员甚至可以上门拜访。

West China Hospital SCU (四川大学华西医院, Sìchuān Dàxué Huáxī Yīyuàn; %24hr emergency assistance in Chinese & English 028 8542 3712, appts 028 8558 6698; www.eng.cd120.com; 37 Guoxue Xiang, 国学巷37号; mHuaxiba) This hospital complex is China’s largest and is among the most well regarded. Foreigners should head for the International Hospital here, where doctors and some staff speak English. Note that some treatments without qualifying insurance may require a deposit.
四川大学华西医院 （Sìchuān Dàxué Huáxī Yīyuàn; % 24 小时中英文紧急援助 028 8542 3712，APPTS 028 8558 6698;www.eng.cd120.com;37 国学祥， 国学巷 37 号 m Huaxiba） 这座医院综合体是中国最大的医院综合体，也是最受推崇的医院之一。外国人应该前往这里的国际医院，那里的医生和一些工作人员会说英语。请注意，一些没有合格保险的治疗可能需要押金。

VISAS
签证

PSB Entry & Exit Service Centre (成都市出入境接待中心, Chéngdūshì Chūrùjìng Jiēdài Zhōngxīn; %028 8640 7067; www.chengdu.gov.cn; 2 Renmin Xilu, 人民西路2号; h9am-noon & 1-5pm Mon-Fri; mTianfu Square) Visa extensions (in seven working days), residence permits and paperwork for lost passports are on the 3rd floor. It’s in the building behind the Mao statue’s right hand, to the left of the Sichuan Science & Technology Museum.
PSB 出入境服务中心 （ 成都市出入境接待中心 ， Chéngdūshì Chūrùjìng Jiēdài Zhōngxīn; % 028 8640 7067;www.chengdu.gov.cn;2 人民西路， 人民西路 2 号 h 周一至周五上午 9 点至中午和下午 1 点至 5 点; m 天府广场） 签证延期（七个工作日内）、居留证和护照遗失的文书工作在三楼。它位于毛雕像右手后面的建筑内，四川省科技馆的左侧。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

AIR
空气

You can fly directly to Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport (成都双流国际机场, Chéngdū Shuāngliú Guójì Jīchǎng; %028 8570 2649; www.chengdu-airport.net; Shuangliuqu Jichang Donglu, 双流区机场东路; mShuangliu International Airport), 18km west of the city, from nearly any other major Chinese city in less than three hours. There are also direct international flights from Amsterdam, Bangkok, Doha, Frankfurt, Kathmandu, Kuala Lumpur, London, Melbourne, San Francisco, Seoul, Singapore, Tokyo and many more destinations.
您可以直飞成都双流国际机场（成都双流国际机场 ，Chéngdū Shuāngliú Guójì Jīchǎng; % 028 8570 2649;www.chengdu-airport.net;双流区机场东路 m 双流国际机场）， 位于城市以西 18 公里处，距离中国几乎任何其他主要城市不到三个小时。还有从阿姆斯特丹、曼谷、多哈、法兰克福、加德满都、吉隆坡、伦敦、墨尔本、旧金山、首尔、新加坡、东京和更多目的地出发的直飞国际航班。

Many travellers fly from here to Lhasa (¥892 to ¥2200; prepare for palpable oxygen deprivation upon arrival). Flights to destinations within Sichuan include Kangding (¥500 to ¥930), Jiuzhaigou (¥830 to ¥1239) and Daocheng-Yading (¥570 to ¥1228), with Ganzi airport still under construction at the time of research.
许多旅客从这里飞往拉萨（892 至 2200 日元，抵达时要做好明显缺氧的准备）。飞往四川境内目的地的航班包括康定（500 日元至 930 日元）、九寨沟（830 日元至 1239 日元）和稻城亚定（570 日元至 1228 日元），在研究时甘孜机场仍在建设中。

Many hostels can book tickets, and the major Chinese airlines are also bookable online.
许多旅馆都可以预订机票，中国主要航空公司也可以在线预订。

BUS
总线

The main bus station for tourists is Xinnanmen (新南门汽车站, Xīnnánmén Qìchēzhàn; 2 Xinnanlu, 新南路2号; h6.30am-6.30pm; mXinnanmen), officially the central tourist station; 旅游客运中心. Two other useful stations are Beimen (北门客运站, Běimén Kèyùnzhàn; %028 8333 4126; 197 Yihuanlu Beisiduan, 一环路北四段197号; h6am-7.30pm; mQianfeng Rd), also called North Gate, and Chadianzi (茶店子). Be prepared to be dropped at any one of these (and other) bus stations when arriving in Chengdu. For Sanxingdui Museum, transfer via the town of Guanghan from Zhaojuesi bus station (昭觉寺汽车站, Zhāojuésì Qìchēzhàn; 88 Zhaoqing Henglu, 昭青横路88号; mSouth Zhaojuesi Rd). If you end up at Shiyangchang bus station (石羊场公交站), local bus 28 (¥2) connects it to Xinnanmen and Beimen bus stations, as well as North train station bus station (火车北站汽车站, Huǒchē Běizhàn Qìchēzhàn; mNorth Railway Station). Limited buses also depart directly from the airport bus station (双流客运站).
游客的主要巴士站是新南门汽车站（新南门汽车站 ，Xīnnánmén Qìchēzhàn;2 Xinnanlu， 新南路 2 号 h 6.30am-6.30pm; m 新南门）， 正式为中央旅游站; 旅游客运中心 。另外两个有用的车站是北门客运站 ，Běimén Kèyùnzhàn; % 028 8333 4126;197 Yihuanlu Beisiduan， 一环路北四段 197 号 h 6am-7.30pm; m Qianfeng Rd）， 又称北门，茶店子 。 抵达成都时，请做好在这些（和其他）巴士站中的任何一个下车的准备。前往三星堆博物馆，从昭觉寺汽车站（昭觉寺汽车站 ，昭青横路 88 号 ，昭青横路 88 号 m ，昭觉寺汽车站 ， 昭觉寺汽车站，昭青横路南昭觉寺路）经广汉镇换乘。如果您最终到达石羊场公交站 ，当地公交车 28 路（2 日元）可将其连接到新南门和北门汽车站，以及火车北站汽车站 （ 火车北站汽车站 ，Huǒchē Bězhàn Qìchēzhàn; m 北站）。 有限的巴士也直接从机场巴士站 （ 双流客运站 ）出发。

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

TO/FROM THE AIRPORT
往返机场

From Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport, airport shuttle buses cover five routes, reaching all corners of the city. Bus route 1 goes to the Minshan Hotel in the city centre. Buses for route 2 (机场班车, Jīchǎng Bānchē; Tianfu Square, 天府广场; ¥12; h6am-10pm; mTianfu Square) – for most purposes this is the most useful bus route – reach the South train station (which also has a metro connection) and then stops frequently along Renmin Lu to the North train station. Route 3 heads to the East train station via the South train station. Route 5 connects with Chadianzi bus station for western Sichuan departures. Route 4 is of the least use to most tourists. It goes to the convention and exhibit centre.
从成都双流国际机场出发，机场班车覆盖五条路线，到达城市的各个角落。1 路公交车前往市中心的岷山宾馆。巴士 2（ 机场班车 ， Jīchǎng Bānchē;天府广场， 天府广场 ; ¥12; h 早上 6 点至晚上 10 点; m 天府广场）—— 对于大多数目的来说，这是最有用的公交路线——到达火车南站（也有地铁连接），然后沿着人民路频繁停靠到火车北站。3 号线经南站前往东站。5 路与茶店子汽车站相连，开往四川西部。4 号公路对大多数游客来说用处最少。它进入了会议和展览中心。

To return by bus to the airport, the easiest bus pick-up (机场班车, Jīchǎng Bānchē; ¥12; h6am-10pm; mJinjiang Binguan) is north of Minshan Hotel outside Jinjiang Hotel metro station.
乘坐巴士返回机场，最简单的巴士接送 （ 机场班车 ，Jīchǎng Bānchē;¥12; h 早上 6 点至晚上 10 点; m 锦江宾观）位于闽山宾馆北侧锦江宾馆地铁站外。

From the airport, metro line 10 connects to line 3 (for the city centre) and 7 (south train station) at Taipingyuan, but it involves a bit of schlepping if you’re travelling with luggage. Airport metro stations can be found in terminals 1 and 2. Depending on where in the city you’re aiming for, the cost is around ¥4 to ¥5. Allow around 25 minutes (with transfers) to travel from the city centre to the airport.
从机场出发，地铁 10 号线在太平原连接 3 号线（前往市中心）和 7 号线（火车南站），但如果您携带行李旅行，则需要一些麻烦。机场地铁站位于 1 号和 2 号航站楼。根据您瞄准的城市哪个地方，费用约为 4 至 5 日元。从市中心到机场大约需要 25 分钟（含接送服务）。

A taxi costs ¥80 to ¥150. Most guesthouses offer airport pick-up services for slightly more.
出租车费用为 80 至 150 日元。大多数宾馆提供机场接机服务，价格稍高一些。

BUS
总线

You can get almost anywhere in Chengdu by bus, as long as you can decipher the labyrinthine routes. Stops are marked in Chinese and English and some post route maps. Fares within the city are usually ¥2.
乘坐巴士几乎可以到达成都的任何地方，只要你能破译迷宫般的路线。站点以中英文标记，部分站标有路线图。市内票价通常为 2 日元。

Bus 1 Wuhou Temple–City centre–Beimen bus station–Zhaojuesì bus station
公交车 1 武侯祠-市中心-北门汽车站-昭觉寺汽车站

Bus 16 Chengdu North train station–Renmin Lu–Chengdu South train station
16 路公交车成都北站-人民路-成都南站

Bus 28 Shiyangchang bus station–Sichuan University–Xīnnanmen bus station–Chunxi Rd–Beimen bus station–Chengdu North train station
28 路公交车石阳场汽车站-四川大学-新南门汽车站-春熙路-北门汽车站-成都北站

Bus 82 Chadianzi bus station–Jinsha Site Museum (stop is 金沙遗址东门)–Sichuan Museum–Culture Park–Wuhou Temple–Xinnanmen bus station
82 路公交车茶店子汽车站-金沙遗址博物馆（站为金沙遗址东门 ）-四川博物院-文化公园-武侯祠-新南门汽车站

Bus 83 Chengdu North train station bus station–Zhaojue Si bus station
83 路公交车成都北站汽车站-昭觉寺汽车站

METRO
地铁

If you’ll be using the metro extensively, it’s worth buying a Tiānfǔ Tōng Kǎ (天府通卡) rechargeable payment card (¥25), which also works for local buses. Look for kiosks at the airport and Tianfu Square metro station, exit A, among other stations. Signage and information is in English as well as Chinese.
如果您要广泛使用地铁，值得购买一张天府通卡充值支付卡（25 日元），该卡也适用于当地公交车。在机场和天府广场地铁站 A 出口等车站寻找售货亭。标牌和信息有英文和中文。

Line 1 links Chengdu North and South Railway Stations, running the length of Renmin Lu and beyond.
1号线连接成都北站和成都南站，贯穿人民路及更远的长度。

Line 2 links Chengdu East Railway Station with the city centre on an east–west route via Chunxi Rd, meeting line 1 at Tianfu Square before continuing west to Chadianzi bus station.
2号线以东西向路线连接成都东站和市中心，途经春熙路，在天府广场与1号线交汇，然后继续向西行驶至茶店子汽车站。

Line 3 runs to nearby the Giant Panda Breeding Research Base and Xinnanmen bus station, ending at Taipingyuan for the connection to the airport.
3号线开往附近的大熊猫繁育研究基地和新南门汽车站，终点站为太平原，连接机场。

Line 4 is of use to tourists mainly for Chengdu West Railway Station.
4号线主要供游客前往成都西站。

Line 7 rings the city, stopping in at Chengdu’s North, South and East Railway Stations as well as the Jinsha Site Museum.
7号线环绕城市，在成都北站、南站、东站以及金沙遗址博物馆停靠。

Line 10 runs from both airport terminals to Taipingyuan, where it’s possible to transfer to line 3.
10 号线从两个机场航站楼开往太平原，在那里可以换乘 3 号线。

Rides cost ¥2 to ¥10 depending on the distance covered. Stations have bilingual signs, maps and ticket machines.
乘车费用为 2 至 10 日元，具体取决于行驶的距离。车站有双语标志、地图和售票机。

AROUND CHENGDU
成都周边

Dujiangyan 都江堰
都江堰

%028 / Pop 630,000
% 028 / 人口 63 万

Two Unesco World Heritage sites in Dujiangyan (Dūjiāngyàn), 60km northwest of Chengdu, make for very different glimpses into the history of Sichuan. Qingcheng Shan, most notably famous as the birthplace of Taoism, offers the chance to hike through misty forests past cascading waterfalls and ancient temples with views back down to the Chengdu plains. The Dujiangyan Irrigation System, the first in the world to control river flooding without the use of dams, is right in the thick of the modern city of Dujiangyan: a look into how ancient engineering marvels still play a role in the life of modern China.
位于成都西北 60 公里处的都江堰 （Dūjiāngyàn） 的两处联合国教科文组织世界遗产，让您对四川的历史一瞥截然不同。青城山是最著名的道教发源地，您可以徒步穿越云雾缭绕的森林，经过层叠的瀑布和古老的寺庙，并欣赏到成都平原的景色。都江堰灌溉系统是世界上第一个不使用水坝即可控制河流洪水的灌溉系统，就在都江堰现代城市的深处：了解古代工程奇迹如何在现代中国的生活中发挥作用。

1Sights
1 景点

Qingcheng ShanTAOIST SITE
青城山道教遗址

(青城山, Azure City Mountain; Front Mountain adult ¥90, student/child/elderly ¥45, Back Mountain ¥20/10; h8am-5.30pm)
（ 青城山 ，Azure City Mountain;前山成人 90 日元，学生/儿童/老人 45 日元，后山 20 日元/10 日元; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点 30 分）

Covered in lush, dripping forests, the sacred mountain of Qingcheng Shan has been a Taoist spiritual centre for more than 2000 years. Its beautiful trails are lined with ginkgo, plum and palm, and there are caves, pavilions and centuries-old wooden temples to explore.
青城山圣山被郁郁葱葱、滴水的森林所覆盖，2000 多年来一直是道教的精神中心。其美丽的小径两旁种满了银杏、梅子和棕榈树，还有洞穴、亭台楼阁和拥有数百年历史的木制寺庙可供探索。

Visitors can experience two sides of the mountain. The main entrance is on the mountain’s front side (前山, Qián Shān) and leads to paths that wind past 11 important Taoist sites. Those interested in hiking will prefer the quieter and more scenic back mountain (后山, Hòu Shān), accessed 40km northwest. In either case, to actually enjoy the views, avoid major holidays when masses of tourists arrive to pay tribute to their ancestors.
游客可以体验山的两面。主入口位于山的正面（ 前山 ，Qián Shān），通向蜿蜒经过 11 个重要道教遗址的小路。那些对徒步旅行感兴趣的人会更喜欢更安静、风景更优美的后山（ 后山 ，Hòu Shān），位于西北 40 公里处。无论哪种情况，要真正欣赏美景，请避开大量游客前来向祖先致敬的重大假期。

The trails at Qian Shan lead to a summit of only 1260m, a relatively easy climb – four hours up and down, even easier via the cable car (one way/return ¥35/60). Snack stands are scattered along the mountain trails, and several of the major temples have small restaurants.
钱山的小径通往只有 1260 米的山顶，攀登相对容易——上下 4 小时，乘坐缆车甚至更容易（单程/往返 35/60 日元）。小吃摊散布在山间小径上，几座主要寺庙都有小餐馆。

If you want to spend the night, a few temples on Qian Shan welcome guests. Most atmospheric is the fantastic Shangqing Temple, a Qing-dynasty rebuild of the original Jin-dynasty temple in the middle of a forest near the top of the mountain, with guest rooms and a restaurant/teahouse attached. Alternatively, the Tianshi Cave Temple (天师洞, Tiānshī Dòng; r from ¥120) has slightly less-welcoming rooms, but is on a quieter stretch of the mountain.
如果你想过夜，前山的几座寺庙欢迎客人。最有气氛的是梦幻般的上清寺 ，这是清朝重建的原晋代寺庙，位于山顶附近的森林之中，设有客房和餐厅/茶馆。另外，天师洞 （ 天师洞 ，Tiānshī Dòng;120 日元起） 的房间稍微不那么温馨，但位于山上较安静的一段地方。

Hou Shan, the back of the mountain, has 20km of rugged pathways – expect a six-hour round-trip hike to the 2128m summit, where you’ll find Baiyun Temple (白云寺, Báiyún Sì); the cable cars at Jinli (one way/return ¥30/55) and Baiyun (one way/return ¥45/80) can shave a couple of hours off the hike. You can find some guesthouses (山庄, shānzhuāng) at Youyi Village (又一村, Yòuyī Cūn), around halfway up the mountain’s west side, of which Jiachun Villa (佳浱山庄, Jiāchún Shānzhuāng; %155 2838 2949; Youyi Village, 又一村; Yòuyī Cūn; r from ¥100; aW) is among the best.
山后山有 20 公里的崎岖小路——往返徒步 6 小时即可到达 2128 米的山顶，在那里您会发现白云寺 （ 白云寺 ，Báiyún Sì）;金里（单程/往返 30/55 日元）和白云（单程/往返 45/80 日元）的缆车可以节省几个小时的徒步旅行时间。您可以在山半山腰的尤义村 （ 又一村 ，Yòuyī Cūn）找到一些宾馆，其中佳浱山庄 （ 佳浱山庄 ，Jiāchún Shānzhuāng; % 155 2838 2949;友邑村， 又一村 ;尤义村;r 100 日元起; a W ） 是最好的。

Dujiangyan Irrigation SystemHISTORIC SITE
都江堰灌溉系统历史遗址

(都江堰灌溉系统, Dūjiāngyàn Guàngài Xìtǒng; adult ¥80, student/child/elderly ¥45, shuttle to Yùlěi Pavilion one-way/rtn ¥10/15; h8am-6pm Mar-Nov, to 5.30 Dec-Feb)
（ 都江堰灌溉系统 ，Dūjiāngyàn Guàngài Xìtǒng;成人 ¥80，学生/儿童/老人 ¥45，接送至逸里亭单程/票价 ¥10/15; h 3 月至 11 月上午 8 点至下午 6 点，至 12 月至 2 月 5 点 30 分）

This Qin dynasty waterworks project (completed in 256 BC) is the oldest and only surviving non-dam irrigation system in the world. Still used to control the water levels of the Mín Jiāng, this scenic area is studded with historic temples, forested hills and hilltop pagodas, as well as coursing waters.
这座秦代自来水工程（公元前 256 年竣工）是世界上最古老、唯一幸存的非水坝灌溉系统。这个风景区仍然被用来控制 Mín Jiāng 的水位，遍布着历史悠久的寺庙、森林覆盖的山丘和山顶宝塔，以及湍急的水域。

WORTH A TRIP
值得一游

SANXINGDUI MUSEUM
三星堆博物馆

The Sanxingdui Museum (三星堆博物馆; Sānxīngduī Bówùguǎn; %0838 5500349; www.sxd.cn; 133 Xi’An Lu, Guǎnghàn, 广汉市西安路133号; ¥80, audio guide ¥10; h8.30am-6.30pm, last entry 5pm), 40km north of Chengdu in Guanghan (广汉), exhibits relics of the Shu kingdom, a cradle of Chinese civilisation dating from 1200 BC to 1100 BC. Some archaeologists regard these artefacts, which include stunningly crafted, angular and stylised bronze masks, as even more important than Xi’an’s Terracotta Warriors. Art and anthropology buffs will need at least a half day here, though budding archaeologists may be disappointed by the lack of access to the dig site itself.
三星堆博物馆 ;Sānxīngduī Bówùguǎn; % 0838 5500349;www.sxd.cn;133 习安路，广汉市西安路，广汉市西安路 133 号 ;80 日元，语音导览 10 日元; h 上午 8.30 至下午 6.30，最后入场时间为下午 5 点） 位于成都以北 40 公里处的广汉 （广汉 ），展出了蜀国的遗迹，蜀国是公元前 1200 年至公元前 1100 年的中华文明摇篮。一些考古学家认为这些文物，包括制作精美、棱角分明、风格化的青铜面具，甚至比习安的兵马俑更重要。艺术和人类学爱好者至少需要在这里呆半天，尽管崭露头角的考古学家可能会因为无法进入挖掘现场而感到失望。

Throughout the 20th century, farmers around Guanghan continually unearthed intriguing pottery shards and dirt-encrusted jade carvings when digging wells and tilling their fields. However, war and lack of funds prevented anyone from investigating these finds. Finally, in September 1986, archaeologists launched a full-scale excavation and made a startling discovery when they unearthed the site of a major city dating back to the Neolithic age in the upper reaches of the Yangzi River (Cháng Jiāng). It was previously believed that the oldest civilisations were concentrated around the Yellow River (Huáng Hé).
整个 20 世纪，广汉各地的农民在挖井、耕田时，不断出土出奇特的陶器碎片和泥土玉雕。然而，战争和缺乏资金阻止了任何人调查这些发现。终于，在 1986 年 9 月，考古学家展开了全面发掘，并在扬子江上游（长江）发掘出一座可追溯到新石器时代的大城市遗址，并取得了惊人的发现。以前人们认为最古老的文明集中在黄河（Huáng Hé）周围。

Buses to the site depart Chengdu’s Xinnanmen bus station (¥50 return, one hour, 9.30am) and return from the museum around 3pm. Alternatively, buses from Chengdu’s Zhaojue Si station (¥12, 1½ hours, 7am to 8pm) head to Guanghan’s tourist bus station (广汉客运中心) – transfer to local bus 10 (¥2, 6.30am to 8pm) for the remaining 10km to the site. A bus from the site back to Zhaojue Si station leaves at 4.10pm, otherwise buses depart the tourist bus station for Xinnanmen every 10 minutes (¥16, 6.40am to 6.50pm).
前往该遗址的巴士从成都新南门汽车站出发（往返 50 日元，一小时，上午 9：30），下午 3 点左右从博物馆返回。或者，从成都昭觉寺站乘坐巴士（12 日元，11/2 小时，早上 7 点至晚上 8 点）前往广汉客运中心 ，转乘当地 10 路公交车（2 日元，上午 6 点 30 分至晚上 8 点），剩余 10 公里即可到达现场。从该地返回昭觉寺站的巴士于下午 4：10 发车，否则每 10 分钟一班巴士从旅游巴士站出发前往新南门（16 日元，早上 6：40 至下午 6：50）。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Joy 100 HotelHOTEL¥
Win 100 酒店酒店 ¥

(幸福驿站, Xìngfú Yìzhàn; %028 8711 2999; 194 Xinfu Lu, 幸福路194号; r ¥85; aW)
（ 幸福驿站 ，Xìngfú Yìzhàn; % 028 8711 2999; 194 Xinfu Lu， 幸福路 194 号 ; r ¥85; a W ）

Of several Chinese hotel chains with a presence in Dujiangyan Ancient Town, this is the best combination of value and location. Clean rooms, friendly staff and, most importantly, an easy walk from both Lidui Gongyuan Station and the entrance to the Dujiangyan Irrigation System. Little English is spoken.
在都江堰古镇开展业务的几家中国连锁酒店中，这是价值和地理位置的最佳结合。干净的房间，友好的工作人员，最重要的是，从李堆贡源站和都江堰灌溉系统入口步行即可轻松到达。很少说英语。

Shangqing TempleGUESTHOUSE¥
上清寺宾馆 ¥

(上清宫, Shàngqīng Gōng; d from ¥80; a)
（ 上清宫 ，Shàngqīng Gōng; d from ¥80; a ）

This Qing dynasty rebuild of the original Jindynasty temple is set in the forest near the top of the mountain; guest rooms are basic but comfortable, though avoid the shared bathrooms. It has a restaurant (dishes ¥18 to ¥30) and a teahouse (tea from ¥10). No English menus, but there are a handful of photos to point at.
这座清代重建的原金朝寺庙，坐落在山顶附近的森林中;客房基本但舒适，但请避免共用浴室。它有一家餐厅（菜肴 18 至 30 日元）和一家茶馆（茶 10 日元起）。没有英文菜单，但有几张照片可以指。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

There are two high-speed rail routes from Chengdu’s North Train Station to the Dujiangyan sites.
从成都北站到都江堰遗址有两条高铁线路。

For the Dujiangyan Irrigation System, take a train to Lidui Gongyuan (离堆公园; ¥15, 33 minutes, 6.02am and 9.21pm). From there, walk out of the station to Dujiangyan Dadao (都江堰大道), turn left through the reconstructed city wall, and walk until the road ends at the site’s entrance.
前往都江堰灌溉系统，乘坐火车前往离堆公园（离堆公园 ，15 日元，33 分钟，早上 6：02 和晚上 9：21）。从那里出站，步行到都江堰大道 ，左转穿过重建的城墙，一直走到路的尽头。

For Qingcheng Shan, take the train to Qingcheng Shan station (青城山; ¥15, 37-49 minutes, 6.02am to 10.17pm). Pick up bus 101, 104, 106 or 109 (¥2, 15-40 minutes, every 10 minutes from 6.56am to 6.30pm) to the main gate (Qián Shān), or a tourist bus (中巴车; ¥25 return, 40 minutes) to Hou Shsn. Tourist buses leave when full and some pass the main gate en route, but only stop for passengers if there are empty seats. A taxi will cost around ¥10.
前往青城山，乘坐火车到青城山站（15 日元，37-49 分钟，早上 6：02 至晚上 10：17）。乘坐 101 路、104 路、106 路或 109 路公交车（2 日元，15-40 分钟，早上 6：56 至下午 6：30 每 10 分钟一班）到正门（前山），或乘坐旅游巴士（ 中巴车 ，往返 25 日元，40 分钟）到后山。旅游巴士满员后出发，部分巴士在途中经过正门，但只有在有空位时才会为乘客停靠。出租车费用约为 10 日元。

Emei Shan 峨眉山
峨眉山 峨眉山

%0833 / Pop 423,070
% 0833 / 人口 423,070

A cool, misty retreat from Sichuan basin’s heat, Emei Shan (3099m) is one of China’s four sacred Buddhist Mountains (the others being Putuo Shan, Wutai Shan and Jiuhua Shan. This excludes sacred Buddhist mountains in the Tibetan regions). A farmer built the first Buddhist temple near Jinding summit in the 1st century. That temple stood until it was gutted by fire in 1972, and many of the more than 150 temples on the mountain suffered fires or looting over the centuries but around 30 have been maintained and restored in various degrees. Reconstructed in the 9th century, Wannian Temple is the oldest surviving temple on the mountain.
峨眉山（3099 米）是中国四大佛教圣山之一（其他山峰是普陀山、五台山和九华山）。这不包括藏区的佛教圣山）。公元1世纪，一位农民在金顶山顶附近建造了第一座佛教寺庙。这座寺庙一直屹立不倒，直到 1972 年被大火烧毁，几个世纪以来，山上的 150 多座寺庙中的许多都遭受了火灾或抢劫，但大约 30 座得到了不同程度的维护和修复。万年寺重建于9世纪，是山上现存最古老的寺庙。

Beyond its rich cultural heritage, the mountain also stands on the edge of the eastern Himalayan highlands and hosts a diverse range of plants and animals, all of which helped place it on Unesco’s World Heritage list.
除了丰富的文化遗产外，这座山还矗立在喜马拉雅山东部高地的边缘，栖息着各种各样的动植物，所有这些都有助于将其列入联合国教科文组织的世界遗产名录。

The Golden Summit, Emei Shan | RICHARD GOULD/EYEEM/GETTY IMAGES ©
峨眉山黄金峰会 |理查德·古尔德/EYEEM/盖蒂图片社 ©

When to Go
何时去

The best time to visit is June to October, when the mist burns off by early afternoon. Epic crowds arrive in July and August; weekends from spring to autumn are always busy. Avoid national holidays at all costs. Snowfall generally begins around November on the upper slopes. In winter you can rent crampons to deal with ice and snow, and jackets (rental ¥30, ¥170 deposit) to stave off the cold. Expect rain and mist throughout the year.
最佳游览时间是六月至十月，此时薄雾会在下午早些时候燃烧殆尽。史诗般的人群在七月和八月抵达;从春天到秋天的周末总是很忙。不惜一切代价避开国定假日。上坡通常在 11 月左右开始降雪。冬天可以租用冰爪来御冰雪，还可以租用夹克（租借30日元，押金170日元）来御寒。预计全年都会下雨和薄雾。

平均气温如下：

12 硬炒咖啡厅 B2

1Sights & Activities
1 景点和活动

The entry ticket (adult ¥160/student and seniors ¥90, winter ¥110/55) gets you access to most sites on the mountain but does not include rides on the three buses to the main routes up or into a few of the temples. You will also need to pay a compulsory ‘insurance’ fee (¥5). You will need your passport to buy a ticket.
门票（成人160日元/学生和老年人90日元，冬季110日元/55日元）可以进入山上的大部分景点，但不包括乘坐三辆巴士前往主要路线或进入一些寺庙。您还需要支付强制性的“保险”费（5 日元）。您需要护照才能购买机票。

Most rewarding is walking the whole way starting from Baoguo Temple, but most opt to ride to Wannian depot (for easy access to the cable car) or to Wuxiangang depot (an easy walk to poetic Qingyin Pavilion and other important sights). The Leidongping bus drops off closest to the summit, just an hour or two short of Jinding Peak (or half an hour up to the upper cable car).
最有价值的是从宝国寺开始全程步行，但大多数人选择乘坐到万年车站（方便前往缆车）或武仙港车站（步行即可轻松到达诗意的青音亭和其他重要景点）。雷东坪巴士在距离山顶最近下车，距离金顶峰仅一两个小时路程（或半小时即可到达上层缆车）。

Regardless of your starting point, getting a feel for the place takes at least a full day, ideally two or three. Wander the wooden temples, hurry past the macaques demanding tribute for safe passage, then find shelter in a monastery guesthouse and wake up in time to welcome the sunrise. The early morning light refracting in the cool mist has been heralded since ancient times as Buddha’s Halo, and the sea of clouds stretching out to the horizon is enough to make even the most jaded traveller feel a little bit closer to the heavens.
无论您的起点是什么，感受这个地方至少需要一整天的时间，最好是两到三天。漫步在木制寺庙中，匆忙经过要求进贡的猕猴以安全通行，然后在修道院宾馆找到庇护所，并及时醒来迎接日出。清晨的光线在凉雾中折射，自古以来就被誉为佛陀的光环，一直延伸到地平线的云海，足以让最疲惫的旅行者感到离天空更近一点。

Jinding TempleBUDDHIST TEMPLE
金顶寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map; 金顶寺, Jīndǐng Sì, Golden Summit)
（ 地图 ; 金顶寺 ， Jīndǐng Sì， Golden Summit）

This temple is at the Golden Summit (Jīndǐng; 3079m), commonly referred to as the mountain’s highest peak. This temple is a striking modern renovation, covered with glazed tiles and surrounded by white marble balustrades. In front, the prominent 48m-tall golden statue of multidimensional Samantabhadra (十方普贤, Shífāng Pǔxián) honours mountain protector Pǔxián, and was added in 2006 though it’s already showing signs of decay.
这座寺庙位于金顶（Jīndǐng，3079m），通常被称为该山的最高峰。这座寺庙是引人注目的现代翻修，覆盖着琉璃瓦，周围环绕着白色大理石栏杆。前面是 48 米高的金色多维普贤像，纪念护山者朴贤，于 2006 年增建，但已经显示出腐烂的迹象。

Fading statues aside, the views at sunset and sunrise, as golden light illuminates the clouds below, are a highlight of any visit to Emei. The mountain’s highest point (3099m) is actually nearby Wanfo Ding (Ten Thousand Buddha Summit), but it has been closed to visitors for some years now.
抛开褪色的雕像不谈，日落和日出时的景色，金色的光芒照亮了下面的云层，是峨眉之旅的一大亮点。这座山的最高点（3099米）实际上就在万佛顶附近，但多年来一直不对游客开放。

Baoguo TempleBUDDHIST MONASTERY
宝国寺佛教寺院

(map; 报国寺, Bàoguó Sì; Emei Shan Lu, 峨眉山路; ¥8; h7am-7.30pm)
（ 地图 ; 报国寺 ， Bàoguó Sì;峨眉山路， 峨眉山路 ; ¥8; h 上午 7 点至晚上 7 点 30 分）

Constructed in the 16th century, this temple (550m) features beautiful gardens of rare plants, as well as a 3.5m-high porcelain Buddha dating back to 1415, which is housed near the Sutra Library. This is not included in the Emei Shan entrance ticket, but as it lies outside the scenic area you won’t need the ticket to visit.
这座寺庙（海拔 550 米）建于 16 世纪，拥有美丽的珍稀植物花园，以及位于经库附近的 3.5 米高的瓷佛，其历史可追溯至 1415 年。这不包含在峨眉山门票中，但由于它位于景区之外，因此您不需要门票即可参观。

Jieyin MonasteryBUDDHIST MONASTERY
结阴寺佛教寺院

(map; 接引寺, Jiēyǐn Sì)
（ 地图 ; 接引寺 ， Jiēyǐn Sì）

A large main hall and several smaller shrines mark the starting point of the final push to Jinding Peak. To take the cable car to Jinding, you’ll have to walk up 1.5km from Leidongping to here.
一座大殿和几座较小的神殿标志着最后冲向金顶峰的起点。乘坐缆车到金定，从雷东坪步行1.5公里到这里。

Wannian TempleBUDDHIST MONASTERY
万年寺佛教寺院

(map; 万年寺, Wànnián Sì; ¥10)
（ 地图 ; 万年寺 ， Wànnián 是; ¥10）

Reconstructed in the 9th century, Wannian Temple (1020m) is the oldest surviving Emei temple. It’s dedicated to the man on the white elephant, the Bodhisattva Pǔxián (also known as Samantabhadra), the Buddhist Lord of Truth and patron of the mountain. This 8.5m-high statue cast in copper and bronze dates from AD 980 and weighs an estimated 62,000kg. If you can manage to rub the elephant’s hind leg, good luck will be cast upon you.
万年寺（1020m）建于 9 世纪，是现存最古老的峨眉寺。它供奉着骑白象的人，菩萨普贤菩萨（也称为普贤菩萨），佛教真理之主和这座山的守护神。这座高 8.5 米的铜和青铜雕像可追溯到公元 980 年，估计重 62,000 公斤。如果你能设法揉搓大象的后腿，好运就会降临到你身上。

Qingyin PavilionBUDDHIST TEMPLE
清音阁佛寺

(map; 清音阁, Qīngyīn Gé)
（ 地图 ; 清音阁 ， Qīngyīn Gé）

Named ‘Pure Sound Pavilion’ after the soothing sounds of the waters coursing around rock formations, this temple (710m) is built on an outcrop in the middle of a fast-flowing stream. Rest in one of the small pavilions here while you appreciate the natural ‘music’ of the water.
这座寺庙（710米）建在湍急的溪流中央的露头上，以岩层周围流淌的舒缓声音命名为“纯音阁”。在这里的一个小凉亭中休息，同时欣赏水的自然“音乐”。

Xianfeng TempleBUDDHIST MONASTERY
咸丰寺佛教寺院

(map; 仙峰寺, Xiānfēng Sì)
（ 地图 ; 仙峰寺 ， Xiānfēng Sì）

Somewhat off the beaten track on the long way round to the peak, this carefully tended monastery (1752m) is backed by rugged cliffs and surrounded by fantastic scenery. Entrance to the nearby Jiulao Cave is ¥10.
这座精心照料的修道院（1752 米）在通往山顶的漫长道路上有点偏离人迹罕至的地方，背靠崎岖的悬崖，周围环绕着美妙的风景。附近的九老洞门票为 10 日元。

Elephant Bathing PoolBUDDHIST MONASTERY
大象浴池 BUDDHIST MONASTERY

(map; 洗象池, Xǐxiàng Chí)
（ 地图 ; 洗象池 ， Xǐxiàng Chí）

According to legend, Elephant Bathing Pool (2070m) is where Pǔxián flew his elephant in for a nice scrub, but today there’s not much of a pool to speak of. Or flying elephants for that matter. There are some elephant statues, though. Being almost at the crossroads of both major trails, the temple here is sometimes packed with pilgrims and often crowded with curious monkeys.
相传，大象沐浴池（2070 米）是 Pǔxián 飞他的大象去擦洗的地方，但今天没有太多的游泳池可言。或者就此而言，飞翔的大象。不过，也有一些大象雕像。这里的寺庙几乎位于两条主要小径的十字路口，有时挤满了朝圣者，也经常挤满了好奇的猴子。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

The tourist district in Emei town surrounds Baoguo Temple and the travellers bus station, where most people will spend a night on their way to and from the mountain. The real draw, though, is sleeping on the mountain itself, in one of the many basic temple-run guesthouses.
峨眉镇的旅游区围绕着宝国寺和旅客汽车站，大多数人往返山上的路上都会在这里过夜。不过，真正的吸引力在于睡在山上，在众多基本的寺庙经营的宾馆之一。

4On the Mountain
在山 4 上

Hóngchún PíngMONASTERY¥
Hóngchún Píng 修道院 ¥

(map; 洪椿坪; %0833 509 9043; dm ¥50, tw ¥60-130; W)
（ 地图 ; 洪椿坪 % 0833 509 9043;DM ¥50， TW ¥60-130; W ）

The smartest temple accommodation on the mountain is at a comfortable 1120m, tucked away in a quiet stretch of forest. Rooms are simple, with wi-fi and shared bathrooms. Approximate walking times from base/summit are three/six hours. Friendly monks-in-residence and a contemplative location make this a great place to sleep if you’re not aiming to summit for sunrise.
山上最智能的寺庙住宿位于舒适的 1120 米处，隐藏在一片安静的森林中。客房简单，配有无线网络连接和共用浴室。从基地/山顶步行的时间大约为三/六个小时。友好的驻僧和沉思的位置使这里成为睡觉的好地方，如果您不打算登顶欣赏日出。

Tàizǐ PíngMONASTERY¥
太平寺 ¥

(map; 太子坪; dm ¥50)
(map; 太子坪 ; dm ¥50)

Blankets are musty and dorms could use a good cleaning, but this closest monastery to Jinding Peak is predictably popular with backpackers. It’s about 40 minutes from here up to the peak, so set your alarm early. You’ll need to leave your passport with staff for the duration of your stay.
毯子发霉，宿舍需要好好清洁，但这座离金顶峰最近的寺院不出所料地受到背包客的欢迎。从这里到山顶大约需要40分钟，所以要早点设置闹钟。在逗留期间，您需要将护照留给工作人员。

Jīndǐng DàjiǔdiànHOTEL¥¥¥
Jīndǐng DàjiǔdiànHOTEL¥¥¥

(map; 金顶大酒店; %0833 509 8088; Jinding, 金顶; r incl breakfast from ¥1280; aW)
（ 地图 ; 金顶大酒店 % 0833 509 8088;金顶， 金顶 ;含早餐¥1280 起; a W ）

This conveniently placed mountain hotel makes an efficient base for catching both sunset and sunrise (it’s just moment’s walk to the summit temples). However, it’s outrageously overpriced for most of the year (in the dead of winter some decent discounts might be available).
这家位置便利的山区酒店是欣赏日落和日出的高效基地（步行片刻即可到达山顶寺庙）。然而，在一年中的大部分时间里，它的价格都高得离谱（在隆冬时节，可能会有一些不错的折扣）。

4In Town
4 在城里

Me & HostelHOSTEL¥
我和旅舍 HOSTEL¥

(map; 我和旅馆, Wǒ hé lǚguǎn; %0833 5098 699; Baoguo Lu, 报国路; dm ¥40, r ¥100; aW)

Smart new hostel with six-bed dorms and bright, spotless and well-thought-out private rooms. There’s friendly English-speaking staff and – the highlight of the place – a delightful cafe serving a range of teas and coffees. Disappointingly, no other food is available so you’ll need to go elsewhere for a meal.
时尚的新旅馆设有六床宿舍和明亮、一尘不染且经过深思熟虑的私人房间。这里有友好的会说英语的工作人员，以及 - 这个地方的亮点 - 一个令人愉快的咖啡馆，供应各种茶和咖啡。令人失望的是，没有其他食物，所以你需要去其他地方吃饭。

Happy HotelHOTEL¥¥
快乐酒店酒店 ¥¥

(map; 幸福树酒店, Xìngfú Shù Jiǔdiàn; %400 823 0917; 31 Baoguo Village, 4th group, 报国村4组31号; r incl breakfast from ¥158; paW)
（ 地图 ; 幸福树酒店 ，Xìngfú Shù Jiǔdiàn; % 400 823 0917; 报国村 4 组 31 号宝国村 4 组 31 号 ; 含早餐¥158 起; p a W ）

This straightforward, very tidy hotel has super-value rooms and a surprisingly good, reasonably priced Chinese restaurant (a rarity in Baoguo Village). The friendly staff speak English and there’s bike rental, too.
这家简单、非常整洁的酒店拥有超值的客房和一家出奇的好中餐厅，价格合理（在宝国村很少见）。友好的工作人员会说英语，还提供自行车租赁服务。

oTeddy Bear HotelHOSTEL¥¥
o 泰迪熊酒店 HOSTEL¥¥¥

（ 地图 ; 玩具熊酒店 ，Wánjùxióng Jiǔdiàn; % 0833 559 0135;www.teddybear.com.cn;43 Baoguo Lu， 报国路 43 号 ;含早餐¥100 起; a W ）

If you can get past the theme (bears, bears, everywhere), this very clean, long-standing backpacker hotel offers nice rooms and English-speaking staff that provide solid, hostel-style travel services plus decent coffee and western food. There’s always a good crew of international and Chinese travellers staying.
如果你能克服这个主题（熊，熊，到处都是），这家非常干净、历史悠久的背包客酒店提供漂亮的客房和会说英语的工作人员，提供扎实的旅馆式旅行服务以及体面的咖啡和西餐。总是有一群优秀的国际和中国游客入住。

EMEI SHAN HIKING ROUTES
峨眉山徒步路线

There are many combinations of paths, buses, cable cars and monastery rest stops on Emei Shan; below are some possibilities. Estimated times exclude breaks, which you will certainly need after all those stairs.
峨眉山上有许多小径、公交车、缆车和寺院休息站的组合;以下是一些可能性。预计时间不包括休息时间，在所有这些楼梯之后您肯定需要休息时间。

A One day Take the bus from Baoguo station to Wannian bus depot (45 minutes, ¥20), then hike to the Golden Summit (five hours) with the help of both cable cars (万年索道站, Wànnián Suǒdàozhàn; ascent ¥65, descent ¥45; h6.40am-6pm). Catch a ride from Leidongping bus depot (1½ hours, ¥50) back to Baoguo Village.
A 一天从宝国站乘坐巴士到万年巴士站（45 分钟，20 日元），然后在两辆缆车的帮助下徒步前往金顶（5 小时）（ 万年索道站 ，Wànnián Suǒdàozhàn;上坡 65 日元，下坡 45 日元; h 早上 6.40 点至下午 6 点）。从雷东坪巴士站乘车（1 小时半，50 日元）返回宝国村。

A Two days Take the bus from Baoguo station to Wannian bus depot, then hike to the summit (6½ hours). Sleep in a hotel at the peak or descend for a monastery, but either way make it back up to the top for sunrise. On the way down, turn right a short distance past Elephant Bathing Pool and take the more scenic path, via Xianfeng Temple, to Wuxiangang depot (eight hours) for a ride back to the village (30 minutes, round trip ¥40).
A 两天从保国站乘坐公交车到万年公交站，然后徒步到达山顶（61/2 小时）。睡在山顶的酒店或下山去修道院，但无论哪种方式，都要回到山顶欣赏日出。下山途中，右转经过大象浴池一小段路，然后沿风景更优美的小路，途经咸丰寺，到达武仙港车站（8 小时），然后乘车返回村庄（30 分钟，往返 40 日元）。

A Three days Hoof it up and down the mountain (20 hours or more in total). To see all the sights the mountain has to offer, ascend via Wannian Temple and descend via Xianfeng Temple. (Perhaps make offerings to sore muscles at each – you’ll be taking a break anyway.)
A 三天上下山（总共 20 小时以上）。要欣赏山上的所有景点，请通过万年寺上山，然后通过咸丰寺下山。（也许每次都为肌肉酸痛做供品——无论如何你都会休息一下。

5Eating
5 吃

On the mountain most temples have dining halls serving filling vegetarian stir-fry for ¥20 to ¥30, and you’re never far from a trailside food stall selling simple dishes, instant noodles (方便面, fāngbiàn miàn), tea and snacks. The unexpected but welcome Hard Wok Cafe is one of few that have an English menu.
在山上，大多数寺庙都设有餐厅，供应 20 至 30 日元的饱满素食炒菜，而您距离小路边的小吃摊不远，出售简单的菜肴、方便面 、茶和小吃。出乎意料但受欢迎的 Hard Wok Cafe 是为数不多的提供英文菜单的咖啡馆之一。

In Baoguo Village, restaurants and supermarkets abound. Haochi Jie (好吃街, Food St) is crammed with places serving Sichuan dishes (¥15 to ¥40).
在宝国村，餐馆和超市比比皆是。 好吃街（好吃街 ，Food St）挤满了供应川菜（15 至 40 日元）的餐厅。

Hard Wok CafeCAFE¥
硬炒咖啡厅 CAFE¥

(map; 晓雨小餐店, Xiǎoyǔ Xiǎocāndiàn; hhours vary)
（ 地图 ; 晓雨小餐店 ， Xiǎoyǔ Xiǎocāndiàn; h 时间各不相同）

As surprising as it is delightful, this tiny cliffside cafe reaches beyond the standard Sichuan noodle menu to include jiānbing (煎饼; ¥25), something between a crêpe and a pancake. Apple and honey? Chocolate and banana? Mix and match to your stomach’s content. It’s about 15 minutes downhill from Hongchun Ping.
令人惊讶和令人愉悦的是，这家悬崖边的小咖啡馆超越了标准的四川面条菜单 ，包括煎饼（煎饼 ，25 日元），介于可丽饼和煎饼之间。苹果和蜂蜜？巧克力和香蕉？根据您的胃内容进行混合搭配。从红春坪下坡约 15 分钟。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

The town of Emei (峨眉山市, Éméi Shān Shì) is the transport hub and lies 6.5km east of the park entrance. Most buses terminate at Emei Shan central station (峨眉山客运中心, Éméi Shān kèyùn zhōngxīn), directly opposite Emei Railway Station (峨眉火车站, Éméi Huǒchēzhàn). If you ask, some drivers will go all the way to the more convenient Baoguo Village bus station (报国汽车站) – which confusingly is also known as the Emei Shan tourist bus station (峨眉山旅游客运中心, Éméi Shān lǚyóu kèyùn zhōngxīn) – for ¥10 more. The High-Speed Train Station (高速列车站, Gāosù Lièchē Zhàn) is the closest to Baoguo Village, around 4km away.
峨眉山市（峨眉山市 ，Éméi Shān Shì）是交通枢纽，位于公园入口以东 6.5 公里处。大多数巴士的终点站是峨眉山客运中心（峨眉山客运中心 ，Éméi Shān kèyùn zhōngxīn），正对面是峨眉火车站（峨眉火车站 ，Éméi Huǒchēzhàn）。如果你问，有些司机会一路去更方便的报国汽车站（报国汽车站 ）——令人困惑的是，它也被称为峨眉山旅游客运中心（峨眉山旅游客运中心 ，Éméi Shān lǚyóu kèyùn zhōngxīn）——多花 10 日元。高速列车站（高速列车站 ，Gāosù Lièchē Zhàn）距离宝国村最近，距离宝国村约 4 公里。

A taxi from Emei town to Baoguo Village is about ¥25 or from the High-Speed Train Station to Baoguo Village is around ¥6 to ¥8. Most guesthouses will pick you up if you arrange it with them in advance. Local bus 8 (¥1.5) connects the Emei town train station with the park entrance.
从峨眉镇到宝国村的出租车大约需要 25 日元，从高铁站到宝国村的出租车大约需要 6 到 8 日元。如果您提前安排好，大多数宾馆都会来接您。当地巴士 8 路（1.5 日元）连接峨眉镇火车站和公园入口。

虽然无法从大多数长途目的地直达保国，但以下长途巴士确实从保国出发：

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

Buses from Baoguo bus station (报国车站, Bàoguó Chēzhàn) travel to three depots on the mountain: Wuxiangang (五显冈车站, Wǔxiǎngǎng Chēzhàn) (30 minutes, round trip ¥40), about a 20-minute walk below Qingyin Pavilion; Wannian (万年车站, Wànnián Chēzhàn) (45 minutes; round trip ¥40), beside the Wannian cable car and a half-hour walk below Wannian Temple; and Leidongping (雷洞坪车站; Léidòngpíng Chēzhàn) (1½ hours, round trip ¥90), a half-hour walk from the Jinding cable car (下金顶索道站; Xià Jīndǐng Suǒdàozhàn; ascent ¥65, descent ¥55, return ¥120; h5.30am-6.30pm). If you return via a different depot, you may have to pay a small surcharge.
从报国车站出发的巴士可前往山上的三个车辆段：五显冈车站 （30 分钟，往返 40 日元），在青音阁下步行约 20 分钟; 万年车站 （Wànnián Chēzhàn）（45 分钟;往返 40 日元），在万年缆车旁，在万年寺下步行半小时;雷洞坪车站 ;Léidòngpíng Chēzhàn）（11/2 小时，往返¥90），距离金顶缆车步行半小时（ 下金顶索道站 ;夏金迪苏达占;上山¥65，下山¥55，回程¥120; h 5.30am-6.30pm）。如果您通过其他车站返回，您可能需要支付少量附加费。

Buses run frequently from around 6am to 5pm (7am to 4pm in winter). The last buses head down the mountain at 6pm (5pm in winter). Don’t be late for the last bus as it won’t wait. The roads up the mountain are very winding and not all your fellow bus passengers will be good travellers. Expect the lovely aroma of car sickness to fill the bus.
巴士从早上 6 点到下午 5 点左右（冬季早上 7 点到下午 4 点）经常运行。最后一班巴士在下午 6 点（冬季为下午 5 点）下山。不要迟到最后一班车，因为它不会等待。上山的道路非常蜿蜒，并非所有巴士乘客都会成为好旅行者。期待晕车的可爱香气充满公共汽车。

Local city buses (¥1.50) run every 30 minutes or so between Emei town’s main transit hubs and Baoguo bus station. The standard fare is ¥1.50.
当地城市公交车（1.50日元）每30分钟左右一班，往返峨眉镇的主要交通枢纽和宝国汽车站。标准票价为1.50日元。

Le Shan 乐山
Le Shan 乐山

%0833 / Pop 1.62 million
% 0833 / 人口 162 万

With fingernails larger than the average human, the world’s largest ancient Buddha draws plenty of tourists to the relaxed riverside town of Le Shan (Lè Shān). This Unesco World Heritage Site is an easy day trip from Chengdu or stopover en route to or from Emei Shan, but the laid-back vibe and higher-quality accommodation options may convince you to linger.
世界上最大的古佛的指甲比一般人还要大，吸引了大量游客来到轻松的河畔小镇乐山（乐山）。这个联合国教科文组织世界遗产是从成都出发的轻松一日游，或往返峨眉山的途中中途停留，但悠闲的氛围和更高品质的住宿选择可能会说服您流连忘返。

乐山古桥 |菲利普·勒让弗尔/盖蒂图片社 ©

1Sights
1 景点

oLe Shan Grand BuddhaBUDDHIST STATUE
o 乐山大佛佛像

(map Google map; 乐山大佛, Lè Shān Dàfó; adult ¥80, children, students & seniors ¥40; h7.30am-6.30pm Apr–early Oct, 8am-5.30pm early Oct–Mar)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 乐山大佛 ， Lè Shān Dàfó;成人 80 日元，儿童、学生和老年人 40 日元; h 4 月至 10 月初上午 7 时 30 分至下午 6 时 30 分，10 月至 3 月初上午 8 时至下午 5 时 30 分）

Le Shan’s serene, 1200-year-old Grand Buddha sits in repose, carved from a cliff face overlooking the confluence of three busy rivers: the Dadu, Min and Qingyi. The Buddhist monk Haitong conceived the project in AD 713, hoping that Buddha would protect the boats and calm the lethal currents.
乐山宁静的、拥有 1200 年历史的大佛坐落在悬崖峭壁上，俯瞰着三条繁忙河流的交汇处：大渡河、岷河和青衣河。佛教僧侣海同在公元 713 年构思了这个项目，希望佛陀能够保护船只并平息致命的水流。

It was 90 years after Haitong’s death that the project was completed, but afterwards the river waters obeyed. Believers credited Buddha’s grace; others pointed to the construction process, in which piles of surplus rocks reshaped the rivers and changed the currents.
海通去世90年后，工程才完成，但后来河水听从了。信徒们归功于佛陀的恩典;其他人则指出了施工过程，其中成堆的多余岩石重塑了河流并改变了水流。

At 71m tall, he is indeed grand. His shoulders span 28m, and each of his big toes is 8.5m long. His ears are 7m. Their length symbolises wisdom and the conscious abandonment of materialism. It is said that heavy gold baubles left Siddartha’s earlobes elongated even after he was no longer weighed down by material things. Inside the body, hidden from view, is a water-drainage system to prevent weathering, although he is showing his age and soil erosion is an ongoing problem.
身高 71m 的他，确实很宏伟。他的肩膀跨度为 28m，每个大脚趾长 8.5m。他的耳朵有 7 米。它们的长度象征着智慧和有意识地放弃物质主义。据说，沉重的金饰让悉达多的耳垂拉长了，即使他不再被物质所压迫。在身体内部，隐藏在视线之外，是一个防止风化的排水系统，尽管他已经老了，而且水土流失是一个持续存在的问题。

To fully appreciate this Buddha’s magnitude, get an up-close look at his head, then descend the steep, winding stairway for the Lilliputian view. Avoid visiting on weekends and holidays, when traffic on the staircase can come to a complete standstill and queues can top two hours or more.
要充分欣赏这位佛陀的伟大，请近距离观察他的头部，然后走下陡峭蜿蜒的楼梯，欣赏小人国的景色。避免在周末和节假日参观，因为此时楼梯上的交通可能会完全停滞，排队时间可能会超过两个小时或更长时间。

Afterwards, head up the path to Su’s Garden (苏园, Sū Yuán) just above the entry and exit area to the Buddha, a manicured garden around a cliffside teahouse (from ¥20) that’s lovely when not hosting lunchtime tour groups.
之后，沿着小路前往苏氏花园（ 苏园 ，Sū Yuán），就在佛陀的出入口上方，这是一个修剪整齐的花园，围绕着悬崖边的茶馆（20 日元起），在不接待午餐时间旅行团时非常可爱。

Admission also includes access to a number of caves and temples on the grounds, though they are a decent hike from the main attraction. Mahaoya Tombs Museum map Google map (麻浩崖墓博物馆, Máhàoyámù Bówùguǎnhas a modest collection of tombs and burial artefacts dating from the Eastern Han dynasty (AD 25–220). Wuyou Temple map Google map (乌尤寺, Wūyóu Sì), like the Buddha, dates from the Tang dynasty, and has Ming and Qing renovations. This monastery contains calligraphy and artefacts, with the highlights in the Luohan Hall – 1000 terracotta arhat (Buddhist celestial beings, similar to angels) displaying an incredible variety of postures and facial expressions: no two are alike. Also inside is a fantastic statue of Avalokiteshvara (Guanyin), the Goddess of Mercy.
门票还包括进入场地上的许多洞穴和寺庙，尽管它们距离主要景点是一段不错的徒步旅行。 马浩崖墓博物馆地图 Google map（ 麻浩崖墓博物馆 ，Máhàoyámù Bówùguǎn）收藏了少量可追溯到东汉时期（公元 25-220 年）的墓葬和陪葬文物。 乌尤寺地图 （ 乌尤寺 ，Wūyóu Sì） 和佛祖一样，可以追溯到唐代，有明清时期的修缮。这座寺院收藏了书法和手工艺品，其中罗汉殿的亮点是 1000 尊兵马俑 （佛教天人，类似于天使），展示了令人难以置信的各种姿势和面部表情：没有两个是相同的。里面还有一尊奇妙的观世音菩萨（观音），观音菩萨，观音菩萨，观世音菩萨，观世音菩萨

A separate park (not included in the Grand Buddha admission), the Oriental Buddha Capital map Google map (东方佛都, Dōngfāng Fódū; %0833 230 1177; ¥80; h8am-6pm), houses a collection of 3000 Buddha statues and figurines from across Asia, including a 170m-long reclining Buddha, one of the world’s longest. There is an entrance near the Grand Buddha’s south gate; otherwise exit and take bus 3 or 13 (¥1) to the Oriental Buddha Capital (东方佛都, Dōngfāng Fódū) stop. The entrance is further than it looks on the park maps.
独立公园（不包含在大佛门票中）， 东方佛都地图谷歌地图 （ 东方佛都 ，Dōngfāng Fódū; % 0833 230 1177;80 日元; h 上午 8 点至下午 6 点）， 收藏了来自亚洲各地的 3000 尊佛像和雕像，其中包括一尊 170 米长的卧佛，是世界上最长的卧佛之一。大佛南门附近有一个入口;否则，请下车，乘坐 3 路或 13 路公交车（1 日元）到 东方佛都 （东方佛都 ， Dōngfāng Fódū） 站下车。入口比公园地图上看起来更远。

TTours
T 旅游

Sightseeing CruisesBOATING
观光游轮划船

(map Google map; 游船, Yóuchuán; Le Shan Dock, 乐山港; 20min round trip ¥70, children under 12yr free; h7.30am to 6.30pm Apr-Oct, from 8am winter)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 游船 ，Yóuchuán;乐山港乐山码头; 往返 20 分钟 ¥70,12 岁以下儿童免费; h 4 月至 10 月上午 7：30 至下午 6：30，冬季上午 8 点开始）

Tour boats leave regularly from Le Shan dock, passing by the cliffs for views of Dafo, which reveal two guardians in the cliff-side not visible from land. The ride is short and, when busy, there’s no guarantee you’ll get much of a view of the Giant Buddha because the cruise boats tend to battle one another for the prime view; you might find your view obstructed by another boat.
游船定期从乐山码头出发，经过悬崖，欣赏大佛的景色，悬崖边有两名守护者，从陆地上看不见。车程很短，在繁忙时，不能保证您能看到大佛的大部分景色，因为游轮往往会为了绝佳的景色而相互争夺;您可能会发现您的视线被另一艘船挡住了。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Haiyun International Youth HostelHOSTEL¥
海韵国际青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥

The only hostel in Le Shan and it’s a good one. Rooms and dorms are painted in striking primary colours and throughout the building there are pictures of old China, Marilyn Monroe and cartoon figurines (quite the contrast!). The English-speaking staff can advise how to get around and where to eat in the area. Dorms have four or eight beds.
乐山唯一的旅馆，是一家不错的旅馆。房间和宿舍都涂有醒目的原色，整个建筑都有旧中国、玛丽莲梦露和卡通雕像的照片（对比鲜明！会说英语的工作人员可以建议客人在该地区的交通方式和用餐地点。宿舍有四张或八张床。

Peace Inn HotelGUESTHOUSE¥¥
Peace Inn HotelGUESTHOUSE¥¥

Small, family-run guesthouse where each of the six arty rooms are different, but all have modern, tiled bathrooms. The owners don’t speak much English, but they do have big, welcoming smiles. It’s a short walk to the Grand Buddha.
家庭经营的小型宾馆，六间艺术客房均不同，但均设有现代化的瓷砖浴室。业主不太会说英语，但他们确实有灿烂而热情的笑容。步行不远即可到达大佛。

Jiayun Mingtai HotelHOTEL¥¥¥
嘉云明泰酒店酒店¥¥¥

This is an impressive new addition to the Le Shan hotel scene. River-facing rooms have big, free-standing bathtubs overlooking the chocolate brown river while the (noisy) road-facing rooms have giant, wall-projected TV’s that made us feel like we were in a lecture theatre. Needless to say, the road-facing rooms are to be avoided.
这是乐山酒店业令人印象深刻的新成员。面向河流的房间设有大型独立浴缸，可俯瞰巧克力棕色的河流，而（嘈杂的）面向道路的房间则配有巨大的墙壁投影电视，让我们感觉自己置身于演讲厅。不用说，要避免朝向道路的房间。

Staff are sweet and there’s a delightful teahouse (open to all; ¥20) that is an ideal place from which to watch the river rapids.
工作人员很贴心，还有一家令人愉快的茶馆（向所有人开放，20 日元），是观看河流湍流的理想场所。

5Eating
5 吃

oZhao Family Crispy DuckBARBECUE¥
o 赵家脆皮鸭烧烤 ¥

(map Google map; 赵记油烫甜皮鸭, Zhàojì Yóutàng Tiánpíyā; %0833 211 4196; 169 Xincun Jie, 新村街169号; meals ¥25; h9am-9pm)

Foodies flock to this simple but superb restaurant for its speciality – sweet, crispy roast duck (jīn; ¥22). The draw is the skin, which is best described as duck candy, a miraculously ungreasy bite of heaven. Eat it while it’s hot – in the middle of the sidewalk with your bare hands, if necessary. Look for the sign ‘Zhaoyazi, 赵鸭子’.
美食家们纷纷涌向这家简单而一流的餐厅，因为它的特色菜是香甜香脆的烤鸭（jīn;22 日元）。吸引人的是皮肤，最好用鸭糖来形容，这是天堂奇迹般不油腻的咬口。趁热吃——如有必要，在人行道中间徒手吃。寻找“昭崖子， 赵鸭子 ”的标志。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

BUS
总线

Le Shan has three main bus stations, all within 5km of each other. Buses from Chengdu’s Xinnanmen station usually arrive at Xiaoba Bus Station (肖坝旅游车站, Xiàobà Lǚyóu Chēzhàn), the main tourist station. The Central Bus Station (乐山客运中心车站, Lè Shān Kèyùn Zhōngxīn Chēzhàn) and Lianyun Bus Station (联运车站, Liányùn Chēzhàn) are also useful.
乐山有三个主要巴士站，彼此相距不到 5 公里。从成都新南门站出发的巴士通常到达主要旅游站肖坝旅游车站 。 乐山客运中心车站（乐山客运中心车站 ，Lè Shān Kèyùn Zhōngxīn Chēzhàn）和连运车站（联运车站 ，Liányùn Chēzhàn）也很有用。

Note: if you’re heading to Emei Shan, it’s better to use Xiaoba Bus Station, as buses from there go all the way to Baoguo (¥11, 45 minutes, every 30 minutes from 7am to 5pm). There is also another bus (¥5) which stops multiple times on the way between Le Shan and Baoguo, taking up to 1½ hours.
注意：如果你要去峨眉山，最好使用小巴汽车站，因为从那里有巴士一直到宝国（11日元，45分钟，早上7点到下午5点每30分钟一班）。还有另一辆巴士（5 日元），在乐山和宝国之间的途中多次停靠，需要长达 1 个半小时。

Other services from Xiaoba Bus Station include the following:
小巴汽车站的其他服务包括：

Chengdu ¥46 to 53, two hours, every 20 minutes (7am to 7pm)
成都 46 至 53 日元，两小时，每 20 分钟一班（早上 7 点至晚上 7 点）

Chongqing ¥147, 4½ hours, frequent (7am to 6pm)
重庆 147 日元，4 小时半，频繁（早上 7 点至下午 6 点）

Emei Town ¥8, 30 minutes, every 30 minutes (7.30am to 6pm)
峨眉镇 8 日元，30 分钟，每 30 分钟一班（早上 7.30 至下午 6 点）

雅安 46 日元，2 小时半，每小时（上午 8：40 至下午 5：30）

自贡 50 日元，三小时，每小时一次（上午 8：10 至下午 5：30）

8 四处走走

当地巴士费用为 1 日元。目的地包括以下内容：
