Ya’an 雅安
Ya’an 雅安

%0835 / Pop 1.53 million
% 0835 / 人口 153 万

Chinese travellers head to the sprawling city of Ya’an (Yǎ’ān) as a hub for activities like picking tea leaves on the hills of Mengshan (蒙山, Méngshān) or watching sunrise from above the clouds at Bull’s Back Mountain (牛背山, Niúbèishān), but for foreigners the primary draw is the Bifengxia Panda Base, a short way out of the city. It’s a treat to glimpse any one of the estimated 2380 surviving pandas in the world (1864 wild pandas and 520 captive), but with bustling Chengdu 150km east, you can get a sense of their natural habitat here. Cubs in the ‘panda kindergarten’ climb high into the trees in their reasonably pleasant enclosures, while humans can hike along a forested river gorge with waterfalls and stunning scenery surrounding the main attraction.
中国游客前往广阔的雅安市（Yǎ'ān），作为在蒙山（Mengshān）山上采摘茶叶或在牛背山（牛背山 ，Niúbèishān）从云层上观看日出等活动的中心，但对于外国人来说，最吸引人的是离城市不远的碧峰峡熊猫基地。 瞥见世界上估计现存的 2380 只大熊猫（1864 只野生大熊猫和 520 只圈养大熊猫）中的任何一只都是一种享受，但从繁华的成都以东 150 公里处，您可以在这里感受它们的自然栖息地。“熊猫幼儿园”中的幼崽在相当宜人的围栏里爬到树上，而人类可以沿着森林覆盖的河谷徒步旅行，那里有瀑布和主要景点周围的迷人风景。

1Sights
1 景点

oYa’an Bifengxia Panda BaseZOO
o 雅安碧峰峡熊猫基地 ZOO

(雅安碧峰峡大熊猫基地; Bìfēngxiá Dàxióngmāo Jīdì; %0835 231 8020; ¥118; h9am-noon & 1-4pm, kindergarten feeding 9.30am & 3pm)
（ 雅安碧峰峡大熊猫基地 ;Bìfēngxiá Dàxióngmāo Jīdì; % 0835 231 8020;118 日元; h 上午 9 点至中午和下午 1 点至 4 点，幼儿园供餐，上午 9.30 和下午 3 点）

Ya’an Bifengxia Panda Base was established in prime forest in Ya’an in 2003 for research purposes rather than tourism, and its mission expanded in 2008 following the earthquake that severely damaged its sister reserve at Wolong. Bifengxia is now home to 80 pandas, some of which may eventually be returned to the wild.
雅安碧峰峡熊猫基地于2003年在雅安的黄金地段建立，目的是研究目的，而不是旅游，2008年，在地震严重破坏其卧龙姊妹保护区后，其任务扩大了。碧峰峡现在有80只大熊猫，其中一些最终可能会被放回野外。

The panda centre is 3km away from the ticket office in the main car park where the minibus drops passengers. Pick up a map and store bags for free at the tourist information office. Turn left out of the ticket office then take the free lift (乘电梯, chéngyúntī; 8am to 7.30pm) down 50 storeys to the foot of the gorge for a 7.5km nature walk to the panda centre entrance. It takes about two hours to reach the centre via the concrete paths passing tall waterfalls, imaginatively named mountains, and a small collection of hanging coffins (悬棺, xuánguān) en route.
熊猫中心距离小巴下客的主停车场售票处 3 公里。在旅游信息办公室领取地图并免费寄存行李。在售票处左转，然后乘坐免费缆车（ 乘电梯 ，chéngyúntī; 上午 8 点至晚上 7 点 30 分）下 50 层楼到峡谷脚下，沿着 7.5 公里的自然步道到达熊猫中心入口。通过混凝土小路到达市中心大约需要两个小时，途经高大的瀑布、富有想象力的山脉和一小堆悬棺（悬棺 ，xuánguān）。

Although this panda base does get chaotically busy at weekends and in holidays in general, it’s much quieter and therefore a more enjoyable visit than the Giant Panda Breeding Research Base in Chengdu. The walk along the valley to the pandas adds to the pleasure of a visit.
虽然这个大熊猫基地在周末和节假日确实会很忙，但它比成都的大熊猫繁殖研究基地安静得多，因此参观起来更愉快。沿着山谷步行到熊猫那里，增添了参观的乐趣。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Those staying overnight can sleep in the park at Qiáotóu Nóngjiālè (桥头农家乐; %138 8243 7340; 200m uphill from Panda Base bus drop-off, 碧峰峡小西天前行200米; r ¥120), a basic guesthouse just beyond the end of the gorge hike, uphill from the panda centre. A handful of guesthouses and restaurants are also by the park entrance, including the park-owned Bìfēngxiá Dàjiŭdiàn (碧峰峡大酒店; %0835 231 8017; Bifengxia tourist centre, 碧峰峡游客中心; r ¥100; aW), but leaving the area to spend the night there won’t allow re-entrance to the park on the same ticket.
过夜的游客可以在公园里睡一晚的 Qiáotóu Nóngjiālè（ 桥头农家乐 % 138 8243 7340;距离熊猫基地巴士下车站 200 米上坡， 碧峰峡小西天前行 200 米 ;r ¥120）， 这是一家基本的宾馆，就在峡谷徒步的尽头，从熊猫中心上坡。公园入口处还有一些宾馆和餐馆，包括公园旗下的碧峰峡大酒店 （ 碧峰峡大酒店 % 0835 231 8017;碧峰峡游客中心;100 日元; a W ）， 但离开该地区在那里过夜将不允许使用同一张票重新进入公园。

Ya’an city itself has masses of accommodation options; most are aimed at business travellers.
雅安市本身就有大量的住宿选择;大多数是针对商务旅客的。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

There’s a near-endless succession of buses from Chengdu’s Xinnanmen station (¥47) to Ya’an’s Ximen bus station (西门车站, Xīmén chēzhàn), but for Bifengxia get off before this at the tourist bus station (旅游车站, lǚyoú chēzhàn) where minibuses (¥5, 45 minutes) wait to take you to the Panda Base. The last bus back to Chengdu from the tourist bus station leaves at 7pm, or it’s also possible to continue on to Qionglai (邛崃; ¥26, one hour) for transfers to the historic town of Pingle (平乐古镇, Pínglè Gǔzhèn).
从成都新南门站（¥47）到雅安西门车站（西门车站 ，Xīmén chēzhàn）的巴士几乎络绎不绝，但对于碧峰峡，在此之前在旅游车站（旅游车站 ，lǚyoú chēzhàn）下车，那里有小巴（¥5,45 分钟）等着带你去熊猫基地。从旅游巴士站返回成都的末班车于晚上 7 点发车，也可以继续前往邛崃 ，26 日元，一小时），然后前往历史名镇平乐古镇 。

From Ya’an’s Ximen bus station, you can head on to various other destinations:
从雅安的西门汽车站出发，您可以前往其他各个目的地：

Emei town ¥44, two hours, six daily (8.50am to 5.20pm)
峨眉镇 44 日元，两小时，每天六点（上午 8：50 至下午 5：20）

Kangding ¥93, 2½ hours, five daily (8am to 1pm)
康定 93 日元，2 小时半，每天五次（上午 8 点至下午 1 点）

Le Shan ¥46, 2½ hours, nine daily (8.50am to 4.50pm
乐山 46 日元，2 小时半，每天 9 点（上午 8：50 至下午 4：50

A pedicab between Ya’an’s two bus stations costs ¥6. At the tourist bus station, the left-luggage office (9.30am to 6.30pm) holds bags for ¥1 per hour.
雅安两个汽车站之间的三轮车费用为 6 日元。在旅游巴士站，行李寄存处（上午 9：30 至下午 6：30）以每小时 1 日元的价格存放行李。

SOUTHERN SICHUAN
川南

Not often on the radar of foreign tourists, steamy southern Sichuan is for those who enjoy digging into history and exploring the quiet side of nature. With dinosaur fossils and lush bamboo forests, as well as some stellar teahouses, there’s plenty to enjoy here.
热气腾腾的川南并不经常受到外国游客的关注，适合那些喜欢挖掘历史和探索大自然宁静一面的人。这里有恐龙化石和茂密的竹林，还有一些一流的茶馆，这里有很多值得享受的地方。

Zigong 自贡
Zigong 自贡

%0813 / Pop 2.67 million
% 0813 / 人口 267 万

This intriguing riverside city has been an important centre of Chinese salt production for almost 2000 years. Remnants of that industry make up part of an unconventional list of sights that includes the world’s deepest traditional salt mine and China’s first dinosaur museum. Zigong (Zìgòng) is also a clear contender for the most atmospheric teahouses anywhere in Sichuan – and thus by definition, China – so there’s plenty of opportunity to just put your feet up for a day.
近 2000 年来，这座迷人的滨江城市一直是中国盐生产的重要中心。该行业的遗迹构成了非常规景点清单的一部分，其中包括世界上最深的传统盐矿和中国第一个恐龙博物馆。自贡（Zìgòng）也是四川（根据定义，中国）最有气氛的茶馆的有力竞争者，因此有很多机会可以站起来一天。

1Sights
1 景点

oDinosaur MuseumMUSEUM
o 恐龙博物馆 MUSEUM

(恐龙馆, Kǒnglóng Guǎn; %0813 580 1235; www.zdm.cn; 238 Dashan Pu, Da’an District, 大安区大山铺238号; adult ¥4, with 3D movie ¥80, student/elderly ¥40, with 3D movie ¥60, child free; h8.30am-6pm; g35)
（ 恐龙馆 ， Kǒnglóng Guǎn; % 0813 580 1235;www.zdm.cn; 大安区大安区大山铺 238 号 ;成人 4 日元，含 3D 电影 80 日元，学生/老人 40 日元，含 3D 电影 60 日元，儿童免费; h 上午 8.30 至下午 6 点; g 35）

Relive your childhood palaeontology fantasies at this spectacular dinosaur museum. It was the first museum of its kind in China and is arguably one of the best dinosaur museums in the world. Built on top of the Dashanpu excavation site, which has one of the world’s largest concentrations of dinosaur fossils, the museum has a fine collection of reassembled skeletons as well as partially excavated fossil pits.
在这个壮观的恐龙博物馆重温您童年的古生物学幻想。它是中国第一家此类博物馆，可以说是世界上最好的恐龙博物馆之一。该博物馆建在大山铺发掘现场的顶部，该遗址是世界上恐龙化石最集中的地方之一，收藏了精美的重新组装的骨骼以及部分出土的化石坑。

The first publicised finds here were made in 1972. The huge numbers of fossils, mostly dating from the rarely seen early and middle Jurassic periods, baffled archaeologists at first. It is now believed that floods swept them here en masse. Budding palaeontologists will appreciate the Huayangosaurus taibaii, the most primitive and complete stegosaur ever discovered, as well as the incredibly rare skin fossil specimens on display. A child-friendly movie screens at 10am, 11am, 2.30pm and 3.30pm daily.
这里的第一个公开发现是在 1972 年。大量的化石，大多可以追溯到罕见的侏罗纪早期和中期，起初让考古学家感到困惑。现在人们认为洪水集体席卷了他们。崭露头角的古生物学家将欣赏迄今为止发现的最原始、最完整的剑龙太白华阳龙 ，以及展出的极其罕见的皮肤化石标本。每天上午 10 点、上午 11 点、下午 2 点 30 分和下午 3 点 30 分放映适合儿童的电影。

Take bus 35 (¥1, 25 minutes) uphill from the city centre (it’s about a 45-minute journey).
从市中心乘坐35路公交车（1日元，25分钟）上坡（约45分钟）。

Shenhai Salt WellHISTORIC SITE
沈海盐井历史遗址

(燊海井, Shēnhǎi Jǐng; %0813 510 6214; 289 Da’an Jie, 大安街289号; adult ¥22, student/child/elderly ¥11; h8.30am-5.30pm)
（ 燊海井 ，Shēnhǎi Jǐng; % 0813 510 6214; 大安街 289 大安街 289 号 ; 成人 22 元，学生/儿童/老人 11 元; h 上午 8：30 至下午 5：30）

This fascinating museum is also a working salt mine. Its 1001m-deep artesian salt well was the world’s deepest well when it was built in 1835 and it remains the deepest salt well ever made using percussion drilling, a technique invented here and later applied throughout the world.
这个迷人的博物馆也是一个正在运营的盐矿。其 1001 米深的自流盐井建于 1835 年，是世界上最深的井，它仍然是有史以来使用冲击钻井建造的最深的盐井，这种技术在这里发明，后来在世界各地得到应用。

Many pieces of original equipment, including a 20m-high wooden derrick that towers above the tiny, 20cm-wide mouth of the well, are still intact. On the 2nd floor of the salt house, rows of cauldrons bubble away day and night over fires powered by natural gas, the mine’s other product, until only fluffy white piles of glistening salt remain.
许多原始设备，包括一个 20 米高的木制井架，它耸立在 20 厘米宽的小井口之上，仍然完好无损。在盐房的二楼，一排排的大锅日夜在由矿山的另一种产品天然气驱动的火堆上冒泡，直到只剩下蓬松的白色闪闪发光的盐堆。

There are excellent English captions explaining the process, from how bamboo was once used to siphon brine from beneath the earth to how soy milk is added to clarify it. Bags of the salt (from ¥3.50) are sold from the window to the right when you exit.
有很好的英文字幕解释了这个过程，从曾经如何使用竹子从地下虹吸盐水，到如何添加豆浆来澄清盐水。一袋袋的盐（3.50日元起）从你出来时从右边的窗户出售。

Take bus 5 or 35 (¥1, six stops) uphill from the city centre.
从市中心乘坐5路或35路公交车（1日元，6站）上坡。

Salt Industry History MuseumMUSEUM
盐业历史博物馆 MUSEUM

(盐业历史博物馆, Yányè Lìshǐ Bówùguǎn; %0813 220 2083, 0813 220 8581; 89 Dongxing Si, 东兴寺89号; adult ¥20, student/child/elderly ¥10, guide ¥60; h8.30am-5.30pm)
（ 盐业历史博物馆 ，Yányè Lìshǐ Bówùguǎn; % 0813 220 2083， 0813 220 8581; 东兴寺东兴寺 89 号 ; 成人 20 元，学生/儿童/老人 10 元，导游 60 元; h 上午 8：30 至下午 5：30）

Housed in an ornate 270-year-old guild hall, this unique museum documents the course of the region’s salt industry, which dates to the first century CE. Salt was at one time valued more than gold, and by the late 19th century industrious salt merchants had turned Zigong into a leading industrial centre.
这座独特的博物馆坐落在一座拥有 270 年历史的华丽会堂内，记录了该地区盐业的进程，其历史可以追溯到公元一世纪。盐的价值一度高于黄金，到 19 世纪末，勤劳的盐商已将自贡变成了领先的工业中心。

4Sleeping & Eating
4 睡眠和饮食

There are plenty of Sichuan restaurants in the tourist district by the river, serving spicy favourites from across the province. For a quicker fix, head down the walking street (自贡商业步行街, Zìgòng Shāngyè Bùxíngjiē; snacks & meals from ¥9; h7am-9pm) for cheap noodles and steamed dumpling (包子) stands. Of course, ask for a bit of local salt.
河边的旅游区有很多四川餐厅，供应来自全省各地的辛辣美食。如果想更快解决问题，可以沿着步行街 （ 自贡商业步行街 ，Zìgòng Shāngyè Bùxíngjiē;小吃和餐点 ¥9 起; h 早上 7 点至晚上 9 点） 购买便宜的面条和包子摊。当然，要一点当地的盐。

Xiongfri Holiday HotelHOTEL¥¥
熊弗里假日酒店¥¥

(雄飞假日酒店, Xióngfēi Jiàrì Jiǔdiàn; %0813 211 8888; www.jiarihotel.com; 193 Jiefang Lu, 解放路193号; r incl breakfast from ¥200; aW)
（ 雄飞假日酒店 ， Xióngfēi Jiàrì Jiǔdiàn; % 0813 211 8888;www.jiarihotel.com;解放路 193 号， 解放路 193 号 ;含早餐¥200 起; a W ）

This large and somewhat faded business hotel is within close reach of Zigong’s riverside sights and the Shizi Kou (十字口) bus stop. Competition among hotels mean that rates are unusually low, which puts it within range of budget travellers.
这家大型且有些褪色的商务酒店靠近自贡的河畔景点和十字口巴士站。酒店之间的竞争意味着价格异常低，这使其处于预算有限的旅行者的范围内。

6Drinking & Nightlife
6 饮酒与夜生活

oWangye TempleTEAHOUSE
o 王爷寺茶馆

(王爷庙, Wángyé Miào; 3 Binjiang Lu, 滨江路3号; h8.30am-11pm)

Housed within the ochre walls of a 100-year-old guild hall of boatmen and merchants, this lively teahouse (officially known as 临江茶楼, Línjiāng Chálóu) is one of the most atmospheric in Sichuan. Tea costs ¥12 to ¥20.
这家热闹的茶馆（正式名称为临江茶楼 ，Línjiāng Chálóu）坐落在一座拥有 100 年历史的船夫和商人行会大厅的赭色墙内，是四川最有气氛的茶馆之一。茶价 12 至 20 日元。

Huanhou PalaceTEAHOUSE
桓后宫茶馆

(桓侯宫, Huánhóu Gōng; Zhonghua Lu, 中华路; h7am-9pm)
（ 桓侯宫 ，Huánhóu Gōng; 中华路 h 7am-9pm）

This teahouse (tea ¥5 to ¥8) is located inside an 1868 butchers guild hall. Its dramatic stone facade opens up onto a tree-shaded courtyard with an old stone stage framed on all sides by beautiful wooden carvings. The antique dealers who share the space generally don’t cut into the tranquility – unless you make eye contact.
这家茶馆（茶 5 至 8 日元）位于 1868 年的屠夫行会大厅内。其引人注目的石头外墙通向绿树成荫的庭院，庭院内有一个古老的石舞台，四面都是美丽的木雕。共享空间的古董商通常不会破坏宁静——除非你进行眼神交流。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

The main bus station (客运总站, Kèyùn Zǒngzhàn; %0813 820 9777; 817 Dangui Dajie, 丹桂大街817号) is a short way south of the river. Destinations include the following:
客运总站 （ 客运总站 ，Kèyùn Zǒngzhàn; % 0813 820 9777;丹桂大街 817 号， 丹桂大街 817 号 ）位于河以南不远的地方。目的地包括以下内容：

Chengdu ¥73 to ¥84, 2½ hours, about every 20 minutes (6.30am to 7pm)
成都 73 日元至 84 日元，2 小时半，约每 20 分钟一班（早上 6.30 至晚上 7 点）

Chongqing ¥76, three hours, every half hour (8.20am to 6.30pm)
重庆 76 日元，三小时，每半小时一次（上午 8：20 至下午 6：30）

Emei Shan ¥60, 3½ hours, four daily (9.10am, 11.50am, 1.30pm and 4pm)
峨眉山 60 日元，3 小时半，每天四次（上午 9：10、上午 11：50、下午 1：30 和下午 4 点）

Le Shan ¥50, three hours, 13 daily (7am to 5.30pm)
乐山 50 日元，3 小时，每天 13 次（早上 7 点至下午 5：30）

Yibin ¥28, one hour, every 30 minutes (7.10am to 7pm)
宜宾 28 日元，一小时，每 30 分钟一班（早上 7 点 10 分至晚上 7 点）

Train services from Zigong are limited. Go to Yibin (¥11, 2 hours, one daily, 9.15am) and take a train from the much busier station there.
从自贡出发的火车服务有限。前往宜宾（11日元，2小时，每天一班，上午9点15分），然后从那里更繁忙的车站乘坐火车。

Yibin 宜宾
Yibin 宜宾

%0831 / Pop 595,000
% 0831 / 人口 59.5 万人

Where the Min and Jinsha converge to become the mighty Yangzi River, Yibin (Yíbīn) has stood as a town of great strategic military importance throughout history, although there’s few visible reminders of the city’s long past. Today it’s a relatively modern mid-sized city, making it a convenient travel hub for trips to old town Lizhuang, the Bamboo Sea and Luobiao’s hanging coffins.
宜宾（宜宾）在闽江和金沙河交汇成为浩瀚的扬子江的地方，在历史上一直是一座具有重要战略军事意义的城镇，尽管几乎没有明显的提醒人们这座城市的悠久历史。如今，它已成为一座相对现代化的中型城市，使其成为前往丽庄老城区、竹海和罗泤吊棺的便捷旅行枢纽。

There’s a lively night market (东街, Dong Jie) with stalls serving diǎndiǎn xiāng màocài (点点香冒菜, skewers boiled in a spicy sauce). In the daytime, look for Yíbīn ránmiàn (宜宾燃面), a spicy, fried noodle dish with a crushed peanut and minced-meat sauce that is a local favourite.
这里有一个热闹的夜市 （ 东街 ，东街），摊位供应点点香冒菜（点点香冒菜 ，用辣酱煮的串）。白天，寻找宜宾燃面 ，这是一种辛辣的炒面，配上碎花生和肉末酱，是当地人的最爱。

Jingmao HotelHOTEL¥¥
景茂酒店酒店 ¥¥

(经贸宾馆, Jīngmào Bīnguǎn; %0831 701 0888, 0831 513 7222; 108 Minzhu Lu, 民主路108号; tw ¥220; aW)

In the middle of the action, this no-frills hotel is clean and serves its purpose. Discounts of up to 20% make it a bargain in this town.
在活动之中，这家朴素的酒店很干净，达到了它的目的。高达 20% 的折扣使它在这个小镇变得很便宜。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

总线

大多数旅客到达高客站（高客站 ，Gāokè zhàn）。 从这里出发的路线包括以下内容：

Chengdu ¥104 to 106, four hours, frequent (7.30am to 7pm)
成都 104 至 106 日元，四小时，频繁（早上 7：30 至晚上 7 点）

乐山 56 日元，四小时，每小时（上午 8：20 至下午 5：30）

自贡 28 日元，一小时，频繁（早上 7 点至晚上 7 点 20 分）

穿过城镇前往南客站（南客站 ， 南客站 ），乘坐巴士前往李庄（4 日元，35 分钟，早上 6：15 至晚上 7：30 每 15 分钟一班）、竹海（22 日元，11/2 小时，上午 9：30）和罗表（33 日元，3 小时，下午 2：05）。

Travellers may find the nearby cities of Changning and Gongxian have more direct buses to the Bamboo Sea and Luobiao.

火车

Trains leaving from Yibin train station (火车站, huǒchē zhàn) include the following:
从宜宾火车站（火车站 ，huǒchē zhàn）出发的列车包括：

Chengdu high-speed train from ¥107, 1½ hours, 15 daily (6.42am to 8.51pm)
成都高铁 107 日元起，11/2 小时，每天 15 班（早上 6：42 至晚上 8：51）

Zigong ¥11 to ¥19, 2½ hours, one daily (4.08pm)

Bamboo Sea 蜀南竹海

%0831 / Pop 3000
% 0831 / 人口 3000

Looking like it’s straight out of a Chinese film set, south Sichuan’s Bamboo Sea (Shǔnán Zhúhǎi), which is protected as the Shunan Zhuhai National Park (蜀南竹海国家公园, Shǔnán Zhúhǎi Guójiā Gōngyuán; ¥110 Jan-Nov, ¥60 Dec), is a world removed from the bustling cities in the centre of the province. Wander through forests of this fast-growing grass (some species of bamboo can grow up to 91cm in a single day!), in an atmosphere so quiet that you can actually seem to hear it growing, or float through the foggy sky on either of the two cable cars. While the park is generally more optimised for travellers with vehicles than those on foot, the interconnected trails in the centre of the park, looping around still forest lakes and along temple-crowded cliff sides, make it worth the trip.
四川南部的竹海（蜀南竹海国家公园 ，110 日元，11 月至 11 月，12 月 60 日元） 的蜀南竹海国家公园 ，看起来就像直接从中国电影中走出来一样，是一个远离省中部繁华城市的世界。漫步在这种快速生长的草丛中（有些种类的竹子一天可以长到 91 厘米！），在如此安静的气氛中漫步，您似乎可以听到它的生长声，或者乘坐两辆缆车中的任何一种漂浮在雾蒙蒙的天空中。虽然公园通常更适合驾车的游客而不是步行的游客，但公园中心的相互连接的小径，环绕着静止的森林湖泊和寺庙拥挤的悬崖边，值得一游。

1Sights & Activities
1 景点和活动

The villages of Wanling (万岭), at the west gate, and Wanli (万里), near the east gate, are the main settlements inside the park. It’s about 11km from one to the other if you follow the road the whole way.
西门的万岭村和东门附近的万里村是公园内的主要聚落。 如果你全程沿着路走，从一个到另一个大约有 11 公里。

Two cable cars (索道, suǒdào) ease the journey considerably, and are a great way to see the forest from another angle. The Guanguang cable car (观光索道, Guānguāng Suǒdào; one way/return ¥30/40; h8am-5pm) near Wanling takes you on a 25-minute ride over a stunning forest and past steep cliffs. There’s a pleasant one-hour walk along the Mo Brook (墨溪, Mò Xī) that loops through the forest just past the cable-car entrance.
两辆缆车（ 索道 、suǒdào）大大简化了旅程，是从另一个角度欣赏森林的绝佳方式。 观光索道（观光索道 ，Guānguāng Suǒdào;单程/往返¥30/40; h 早上 8 点至下午 5 点） 在万岭附近，带您乘坐 25 分钟的车程，穿越迷人的森林，经过陡峭的悬崖。沿着墨溪（墨溪 ，Mò Xī）步行一小时，穿过森林，经过缆车入口。

From the end of the Guanguang cable car, either follow the signs for a free lift to the Daxiagu cable car (大峡谷索道, Dàxiágǔ Suǒdào; one way/return ¥20/30; h8.30am-5.30pm), a 10-minute ride traversing a dramatic gorge, or walk to the junction at Sanhe Jie (三合界) where you can find a small selection of accommodation and food.
从广光缆车的终点出发，按照指示牌免费乘坐大峡谷索道，到达大峡谷索道 ，单程/往返¥20/30; h 8.30am-5.30pm），10 分钟车程穿越壮观的峡谷，或步行到三合界的交汇处，在那里你可以找到少量的住宿和食物。

From both Daxiagu or Sanhe Jie your destination is the same: the trails that trace through the scenic area, which includes a number of small lakes and caves with picturesque names like ‘Sea within the Sea’ (海中海) and ‘Cave of the Immortals’ (仙禹洞). Either way, at the end of the paths you’ll need to retrace your steps or head back via the opposite route.
从大厦谷或三河街出发，您的目的地是相同的：穿过风景区的小径，其中包括许多风景如画的小湖泊和洞穴，如“ 海中海”（海中海 ）和“仙人洞”（ 仙禹洞 ）。无论哪种方式，在路径的尽头，您都需要原路返回或从相反的路线返回。

If you end up with extra time in Wanling at the end of the day, the nearby Forgotten Worries Valley (忘忱谷, Wàngchén Gǔ) makes for a nice two-hour walk from the village and back past a number of progressively larger waterfalls.
如果您在一天结束时在万岭有额外的时间， 那么附近的忘忱谷（忘忱谷 ，Wàngchén Gǔ）可以从村庄步行两个小时，然后经过一些逐渐变大的瀑布返回。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Settle in a hotel in Wanling, with the friendly Yang family’s tidy, basic Joan’s Guesthouse (晶鑫园衣家乐, Jīngxīn Yuán Yījiālè; %135 4771 7196; www.snzhjourney.com; West gate, 200m past the small bridge on Wanling’s main square, 小桥广场往观云亭方向前行200米左手边; r ¥120-160; aW) on the road above the village or at the Chéngbīnlóu Jiǔdiàn (承宾楼酒店; %0831 498 0104; Wanling village square, 蜀南竹海小桥（西大门前1公里）; s/tw ¥220/280; aW) on the main square.
入住万陵的一家酒店，友好的杨家整洁、简陋的 Joan's Guesthouse（ 晶鑫园衣家乐 ，Jīngxīn Yuán Yījiālè; % 135 4771 7196;www.snzhjourney.com;西门，经过万陵主广场小桥 200 米， 小桥广场往观云亭方向前行 200 米左手边 ;r ¥120-160; a W ） 在村子上方的道路上或承宾楼酒店（承宾楼酒店 % 0831 498 0104; 蜀南竹海小桥（西大门前 1 公里）;新/TW ¥220/280; a W ） 在主广场上。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Buses into the park stop at the west gate to allow you to get off and buy your entrance ticket, before passing through Wanling village and then terminating at Wanli.
进入公园的巴士在西门停靠，以便您下车购买门票，然后经过万岭村，然后在万里结束。

There are two direct buses from Wanli to Yibin (¥22, two hours, 7am and 2pm). Both pass Wanling (40 minutes) and, if you ask, will drop you at the junction for Changníng (one hour; 15km from the main western park entrance), where you can change for Gongxian to get to Luobiao. Smaller local buses shuttle every 15 minutes between Wanling and Changning (¥6, 7am to 6pm).
从万里到宜宾有两趟直达巴士（22 日元，两小时，早上 7 点和下午 2 点）。两者都经过万陵（40 分钟），如果您提出要求，将您送到长宁路口（1 小时，距离西部公园主入口 15 公里），在那里您可以换乘贡县前往罗标。小型当地巴士每 15 分钟一班往返于万陵和长宁之间（6 日元，上午 7 点至下午 6 点）。

Motorbike taxis can take you between the two main villages (around ¥60, 45 minutes) if you decide not to walk.
如果您决定不步行，摩托车出租车可以带您往返于两个主要村庄之间（约 60 日元，45 分钟）。

WESTERN SICHUAN
川西

West of Chengdu, green tea becomes butter tea, gentle rolling hills morph into jagged snowy peaks and the Mandarin nǐ hǎo! gives way to Tibetan tashe deleg!
成都以西，绿茶变成了黄油茶，平缓起伏的山丘变成了锯齿状的雪峰和普通话 nǐ hǎo！ 让位于藏族的 tashe deleg！

This is the Garze Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, a territory that corresponds roughly with the Kham (in Chinese 康巴, Kāngbā), one of old Tibet’s three traditional provinces. It is home to more than a dozen distinct Tibetan tribes, the largest being the Khampas, historically fierce warriors and horsemen.
这就是噶尔孜藏族自治州，这片领土与旧西藏三大传统省份之一的康巴（汉语康巴 ，Kāngbā）大致相对应。这里是十几个不同的藏族部落的家园，其中最大的是康巴人，他们在历史上是凶猛的战士和骑兵。

Each season brings its own rugged beauty. In spring and summer many remote towns and monasteries can feel abandoned as villagers head out to harvest byar rtswa dgun bu (虫草, chóngcǎo) – cordyceps in English – a medicinal caterpillar fungus that grows on the alpine slopes and retails for outrageous amounts in lowland China and increasingly throughout the world.
每个季节都有其粗犷的美丽。在春季和夏季，许多偏远的城镇和寺院都会感到被遗弃，因为村民们会感到被遗弃， 因为村民们会感到被遗弃，虫草（虫草 ，chóngcǎo）——一种药用毛虫，生长在高山山坡上，在中国低地和世界各地零售价高得离谱。

8Information
8 信息

At these elevations, altitude sickness and acute mountain sickness (AMS) are very real concerns, especially for those looking to get out into nature for long periods. Acclimatise slowly and carefully, and if you start to suffer from AMS symptoms descend immediately to lower elevations.
在这些海拔地区，高原反应和急性高山病 （AMS） 是非常现实的问题，特别是对于那些希望长时间亲近大自然的人来说。缓慢而小心地适应环境，如果您开始出现 AMS 症状，请立即下降到较低的海拔地区。

Western Sichuan endures up to 200 freezing days per year, but sunny summer days can be blistering. This, combined with the high altitude, can leave new arrivals vulnerable to bad sunburn in addition to altitude sickness. Pack layers and take a couple of days to acclimatise when you arrive and as you continue to gain elevation.
川西每年有多达 200 天的冰冻天气，但阳光明媚的夏日可能会很酷。再加上高海拔，除了高原反应之外，新来者还容易受到严重晒伤。多穿几层衣服，并在您到达时和继续获得海拔时花几天时间来适应环境。

Kangding 康定
康定康定

%0836 / Pop 134,000 / Elev 2560m
% 0836 / 人口 13.4 万人 / 学生 2560m

Coming from the Chengdu area, there are two main gateways into Tibetan Sichuan. One is Danba, but far more popular is Kangding (Kāngdìng; known in Tibetan as Dartsendo or Dardo), the capital of the Garze Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture.
从成都地区出发，有两个主要门户进入西藏四川。一个是丹巴，但更受欢迎的是康定（Kāngdìng，藏语称为达尔森多或达尔多），加尔孜藏族自治州的首府。

Set in a steep river valley at the confluence of the raging Zheduo and Yala Rivers (the Dar and Tse in Tibetan), Kangding offers an easy introduction to Tibetan culture and a couple of days here allows you to acclimatise while still being in range of mountains like enormous Gongga Shan to the south, one of nearly two dozen peaks over 6000m within a few hours’ drive.
康定坐落在汹涌的浙多河和雅拉河（藏语中的达尔河和泽河）交汇处的陡峭河谷中，可以轻松了解藏族文化，在这里度过几天，您可以适应环境，同时仍然位于南边巨大的贡嘎山，这是近二十座超过 6000 米的山峰之一，车程不到几个小时。

This town has long stood as a trading centre between the Tibetan and Han, with sizeable Hui and Qiang minority populations also part of the mix; you’ll find elements of all these cultures represented here. Goldenroofed monasteries, a city-centre mosque and several large churches attest to the town’s diversity.
这个小镇长期以来一直是藏族和汉族之间的贸易中心，大量回族和羌族也参与其中;您会在这里找到所有这些文化的元素。金色屋顶的修道院、市中心的清真寺和几座大型教堂证明了该镇的多样性。

Kangding (Dartsendo)
康定（达森多）

1Sights
1 景点

Nánwú SìBUDDHIST TEMPLE
南武寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(南无寺, Lhamo Tse; Lucheng Nanlu, 炉城南路; h7am-9pm) F

This temple belongs to the Gelugpa (Yellow Hat) sect of Tibetan Buddhism and is the most active monastery in the area. Walk south along the main road, cross the river and keep going for about 200m until you see a small sign (‘南無村’) for the monastery on your right. Follow the road straight uphill on a steep road to the gold-capped roofs.
这座寺庙属于藏传佛教的格鲁派（黄帽）教派，是该地区最活跃的寺院。沿着主干道向南走，过河，继续前行约 200 米，直到右手边看到一个小标志（“ 南无村 ”）。沿着陡峭的道路直上坡，到达金顶屋顶。

Jingang SiBUDDHIST TEMPLE
金港寺佛寺

(金刚寺; Dordrak Lhakang; Lucheng Nanlu, 炉城南路; h7am-9pm) F
（ 金刚寺 ;多德拉克拉克拉康;炉城南路 h 7am-9pm） F

A short way south of town, along the main road, is this 400-year-old Nyingma (Red Hat sect) monastery. To get there, turn right from the main road into an archway labelled ‘金刚村’.
在城镇以南不远的地方，沿着主干道，是这座拥有 400 年历史的宁玛派（红帽教）寺院。要到达那里，请从主干道右转进入标有“ 金刚村 ”的牌坊。

Guānyīn SìBUDDHIST TEMPLE
关音寺 BUDDHIST TEMPLE

(map Google map; 观音寺; 9 Paomashan Donglu, 跑马山东路9号; h7am-6pm) F

Looming over Kangding on the lower slopes of Paoma Shan, above the three main halls of the temple, is a path that leads on to several pagodas and another remote prayer hall. Continue following the same path to reach the scenic area around the Pǎomǎ Sì map Google map (跑马寺, Dentok Lhakang; ¥50; h8am-6pm).
在炮马山较低的山坡上，在寺庙的三个主殿上方，有一条小路通向几座宝塔和另一个偏远的祈祷殿。继续沿着原路到达 Pǎomǎ Sì 地图 Google map（ 跑马寺 ，Dentok Lhakang;¥50; h 上午 8 点至下午 6 点）。

Ānjué SìBUDDHIST TEMPLE
安觉西佛寺

(map Google map; 安觉寺, Ngachu Gompa; 52 Yanhe Xilu, 沿河西路52号; h7am-6.30pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 安觉寺 ， Ngachu Gompa; 52 Yanhe Xilu， 沿河西路 52 号 h 7am-6.30pm）

This central temple’s two small halls built around a colourful central courtyard have roots dating back to 1652, but it’s been much rebuilt in the centuries since. It was said to have been established by the fifth Dalai Lama. Despite its illustrious beginnings, it’s today suffering from an ever-decreasing number of monks (currently just 28).
这座中央寺庙的两个小殿围绕着色彩缤纷的中央庭院而建，其历史可以追溯到 1652 年，但此后的几个世纪里，它已经进行了大量重建。据说它是由五世达赖喇嘛建立的。尽管它的开端辉煌，但如今它的僧侣数量却在不断减少（目前只有 28 人）。

2Activities
2 活动

The mountains looming over Kangding are ideal for day walks and a great way of safely acclimatising and preparing yourself for the high altitude adventures that lie just to the west. For most walks you’ll need a guide, which can be arranged easily through any of the main guesthouses and hostels.
康定上空若隐若现的群山是一日游的理想场所，也是安全适应环境并为西边的高海拔探险做好准备的好方法。对于大多数步行，您需要一名导游，可以通过任何主要宾馆和旅馆轻松安排导游。

Jiǔlián ShānMOUNTAIN
九莲山

(九连山) F

The best way of acclimatising and getting fit for adventures further west is to climb the beautiful Mt Jiulian. The trail rises steeply through forest but the top is a rolling grassland plateau of between 3500 and 4000m, beyond which horses and yaks graze and there might even be the odd nomad tent. Access it behind Zhilam Hostel, which can provide maps and guides (advisable) for guests.
适应环境和适应更西边的冒险的最佳方式是攀登美丽的九连山。这条小径陡峭地穿过森林，但顶部是一片海拔 3500 至 4000 米的连绵起伏的草原高原，马匹和牦牛在高原上吃草，甚至可能还有奇怪的游牧帐篷。进入 Zhilam Hostel 后面，可以为客人提供地图和指南（建议）。

If you’ve just arrived in town from lower elevations, be sure to spend at least one day resting before climbing up.
如果您刚刚从低海拔地区抵达城镇，请务必在爬上山之前至少休息一天。

Paoma ShanMOUNTAIN
宝马山

(map Google map; 跑马山, Dentok Rawo; ¥50; h8am-6pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 跑马山 ， Dentok Rawo; ¥50; h 上午 8 点至下午 6 点）

Paoma Shān is the famed mountain of the Kāngdìng Qíng Gē (‘Kangding Love Song’), one of China’s most enduring folk songs, and will appeal the most to those who are familiar with the ditty. It’s an easy ascent on foot, or take the cable car (索道, Suǒdào; 36 Xiangyang Jie, 向阳街36号; one way/return adult ¥35/55, child (rtn only) ¥25; h9am-6pm) halfway up for excellent views of the town and surrounding peaks and valleys. You have to pay to go all the way up the stepped path, past ribbons of prayer flags and the Pǎomǎ Sì.
炮马山是中国最经久不衰的民歌之一《 康定情歌》的著名山峰，最能吸引熟悉这首小曲的人。步行即可轻松上山，或乘坐缆车 （ 索道 ，Suǒdào;36 Xiangyang Jie， 向阳街 36 号 ;单程/往返成人 35/55 日元，儿童（仅限 rtn）25 日元; h 上午 9 点至下午 6 点） 可以欣赏到城镇和周围山峰和山谷的美景。你必须付费才能沿着阶梯式小路一路走，经过经幡和 Pǎomǎ Sì 的丝带。

zFestivals & Events
z 节日和活动

Circling the Mountain FestivalRELIGIOUS
环山节 RELIGIOUS

(转山节, Zhuǎnshānjié)
（ 转山节 ， Zhuǎnshānjié）

Kangding’s biggest annual festival takes place on Paoma Shan on the eighth day of the fourth lunar month (normally in May) to commemorate the birthday of the Historical Buddha, Sakyamuni. White and blue Tibetan tents cover the hillside and there’s wrestling, horse racing and visitors from all over western Sichuan.
康定最大的年度节日于农历四月八（通常在五月）在炮马山举行，以纪念历史佛释迦牟尼的诞辰。山坡上覆盖着白色和蓝色的藏式帐篷，这里有摔跤、赛马和来自川西各地的游客。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Konka International Youth HostelHOSTEL¥
康佳国际青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥

(贡嘎国际青年旅舍, Gònggā Guójì Qīngnián Lǚshě; %0836 281 7788, 189 9048 1279; 3rd fl, 59 Dongguan Yinle Guangchangjie, 东关音乐广场街59号3楼; dm ¥35-40, d ¥150; W)

The most convenient option for transiting bus travellers, this sprawling hostel has slightly scrappy dorms (six or eight beds) and rooms. Some English is spoken and staff can help arrange self-guided excursions into the mountains, even loaning outdoor gear. Lively communal dinners include vegetarian options (¥18 to ¥24 per person). Just 50m to the left (west) of the bus station.
这家庞大的旅馆是过境巴士旅客最方便的选择，拥有略显简陋的宿舍（六张或八张床）和房间。酒店会说一些英语，工作人员可以帮助安排自助游览山区，甚至借用户外装备。热闹的公共晚餐包括素食选择（每人 18 至 24 日元）。就在公交车站左侧（西侧）50m 处。

oZhilam HostelHOSTEL¥¥
o Zhilam Hostel HOSTEL¥¥

(map Google map; 汇道客栈, Huìdào Kèzhàn; %0836 283 1100; www.zhilamhostel.com; 72 Baitukan Xiang, 白土坎巷72号; dm ¥50, r with/without bathroom from ¥160/240, family ¥460; iW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 汇道客栈 ，Huìdào Kèzhàn; % 0836 283 1100;www.zhilamhostel.com;白土坎巷 72 号， 白土坎巷 72 号 ;DM ¥50，R 带/不带卫浴¥160/240 起，家庭¥460 起; i W ）

Run by an American family, this fabulous hillside hostel is a comfortable base in Kangding. It provides all manner of top-end hostel services, from camping-gear rental to good western food (served in a nomad tent built into the dining room!) and travel advice. It’s a winding 10-minute walk uphill from the city centre.
这家神话般的山坡旅馆由一个美国家庭经营，是康定的舒适基地。它提供各种高端旅馆服务，从露营装备租赁到美味的西餐（在餐厅内置的游牧帐篷中供应！从市中心步行 10 分钟即可到达。

Zhilam is also a reliable resource for wilderness adventures, and can arrange guides and transport to trek the Gongga Shan circuit, visit nearby Muge Cuo lake or other adventures.
直南也是荒野探险的可靠资源，可以安排导游和交通工具徒步贡嘎山环线、参观附近的木哥措湖或其他探险活动。

CLOSED AREAS
封闭区域

As in most Tibetan areas of China, restrictions on foreign tourists visiting certain areas are common. In general, most of western Sichuan is normally open to tourists, but at the time of research there were some travel restrictions in place. Seda, which is home to the massive Larung Gar Five Sciences Buddhist Academy, has been closed to foreigners for some years though rumours were swirling at the time of research that it might be about to reopen (according to the regional government it is now possible to visit, but the local government is still refusing tourists entry). Also closed was Yaqing in Baiyu county, which is home to the extraordinary Yarchen Gar Buddhist Institute; even Chinese visitors are currently banned from visiting here. Although it’s officially only these two towns that are closed, in reality the whole of Baiyu county, including the main town of Baiyu, is closed to foreigners.
与中国大多数藏族地区一样，对外国游客访问某些地区的限制很常见。总的来说，川西大部分地区通常对游客开放，但在研究时，有一些旅行限制。色达是大型拉荣噶尔五科佛学院的所在地，多年来一直不对外国人开放，尽管在研究时有传言称它可能即将重新开放（根据地区政府的说法，现在可以参观，但当地政府仍然拒绝游客入境）。同样关闭的还有白玉县的雅庆，这里是非凡的雅陈噶尔佛学院的所在地;目前，即使是中国游客也被禁止访问这里。虽然官方封闭的只有这两个镇，但实际上整个白玉县，包括白玉主镇，都对外国人关闭。

The official reason for the closures is that the monastery towns have grown too fast and with little in the way of planning, sewage systems or fire-safety systems, and that the government was therefore demolishing certain buildings in order to improve safety and hygiene. However, many local people and Tibetan groups report that mass demolitions of the monks’ and nuns’ housing is taking place simply because the monasteries are seen to be becoming too large and powerful and attracting too many people from other parts of Tibet and China. There are widespread reports in the international media of forced relocations and ‘re-education’ of monks and nuns.
关闭的官方原因是修道院城镇发展太快，规划、污水处理系统或消防安全系统几乎没有，因此政府正在拆除某些建筑物以提高安全和卫生。然而，许多当地人和藏人团体报告说，僧尼的住房被大规模拆除只是因为寺院变得太大、太强大，吸引了太多来自西藏和中国其他地区的人。国际媒体广泛报道了僧尼被迫搬迁和“再教育”的消息。

Due to these closures we have been unable to conduct on-the-ground research in Seda, Yaqing and Baiyu.
由于这些关闭，我们无法在色达、雅青和白玉进行实地研究。

Foreigners are forbidden from travelling individually overland from Sichuan into the Tibetan Autonomous Region (西藏, Xīzàng) as Tibet’s far eastern prefecture of Chamdo (昌都地区, Chāngdū Dìqū), which borders Sichuan, is usually off limits. During March (a time of holy celebrations and politically sensitive anniversaries), Tibet is often completely closed to foreigners. This closure has extended to Sichuan’s Aba and Ganzi Prefectures before as well, though not in recent years.
外国人被禁止从四川陆路单独进入西藏自治区（ 西藏 ，Xīzàng），因为西藏远东地区与四川接壤的昌都地区（昌都地区 ，Chāngdū Dìqū）通常是禁止进入的。在三月（神圣的庆祝活动和政治敏感的周年纪念日）期间，西藏通常对外国人完全关闭。这种关闭此前也曾扩展到四川的阿坝州和甘孜州，尽管近年来没有。

Hostels keep up with the latest information, or check the China and Tibet branches of Lonely Planet’s online forum, Thorn Tree (www.lonelyplanet.com/thorntree).
旅舍可以及时了解最新信息，或者查看孤独星球在线论坛荆棘树（www.lonelyplanet.com/thorntree）的中国和西藏分部。

Attractive guesthouse with a covered dining terrace surrounded by a virtual rainforest of tropical flowers. The green motif continues inside where each of the homely rooms has floral touches and quality furnishings. 迷人的宾馆设有带顶棚的用餐露台，周围环绕着虚拟的热带花卉雨林。绿色图案延续在内部，每间温馨的房间都配有花卉装饰和优质家具。苹果煎饼是在高地草原上吃牦牛肉几周后再吃的一种特别的享受。

EATING TIBETAN
吃藏菜

While there’s plenty of decent Sichuan cuisine available throughout most of the region, you should really use this opportunity to delve into the radically different world of Tibetan cuisine. From a breakfast of sticky porridge-like tsampa to a lunch of raw yak meat in a remote nomad tent, eating in western Sichuan is always an adventure.
虽然该地区大部分地区都有很多不错的四川菜，但您真的应该利用这个机会深入探索完全不同的藏菜世界。从糯粥般的糌粑早餐，到偏远游牧帐篷里的生牦牛肉午餐，在川西吃饭总是一次冒险。

5Eating
5 吃

Mágē MiànNOODLES¥
Mágē Miàn 面条 ¥

(map Google map; 麻哥面; 59 Yanhe Xilu, 沿河西路59号; noodles ¥11-13; h24hr)

A local classic, this hole-in-the-wall place right in the town centre draws crowds of locals for its house special: ma’gē miàn (麻哥面) – noodles topped with a spicy mince-meat sauce in small (一两, yīliǎng; ¥11) or large (二两, èr liǎng; ¥13) servings.
这家位于市中心的破洞餐厅是当地的经典之作，因其特色菜吸引了大批当地人： 马哥面 ——面条上淋上辛辣的肉末酱，有小份（ 一两 ，yīliǎng;11 日元）或大份（ 二两 ，èr liǎng;13 日元）。

Malaya Tibetan RestaurantTIBETAN¥¥
马来亚藏餐厅藏菜¥¥

(map Google map; 玛拉亚藏餐, Mǎlāyà Zàngcān; %0836 287 7111; 6th fl, 14 Yanhe Donglu, 沿河东路14号6楼; dishes from ¥25-40; h11am-9pm; W)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 玛拉亚藏餐 ，Mǎlāyà Zàngcān; % 0836 287 7111; 沿河东路 14 号东路 14 号 6 楼 ; 菜品 25-40 元; h 上午 11 点至晚上 9 点; W ）

A friendly restaurant-cum-teahouse serving upmarket Tibetan dishes in a dining room decorated with mani stones (stones inscribed with mantras) and with views out over the city. If you need inspiration from the menu, try the yak-meat burger (meat stew topped with flatbread; ¥68) or the Tibetan-style beef dumplings (藏式牛肉包子; ¥28). Despite the fairly high prices, the food is only so-so.
友好的餐厅兼茶馆，在装饰有玛尼石（刻有咒语的石头）的餐厅内供应高档藏式菜肴，并享有城市美景。如果您需要从菜单中汲取灵感，可以尝试牦牛肉汉堡（炖肉配大饼，68 日元）或藏式牛肉包子（藏式牛肉包子 ，28 日元）。尽管价格相当高，但食物也只是马马虎虎。

Located above the fast-food joint Dico’s (德克士); walk up then take the elevator to the 6th floor.
位于快餐店 Dico's （ 德克士 ） 上方;走上去，然后乘坐电梯到 6 楼。

6Drinking & Nightlife
6 饮酒与夜生活

Himalayan Coffee & Trading Co.CAFE
喜马拉雅咖啡贸易有限公司 CAFE

The best coffee in town is served at this bright, cool and busy place near the big yak sculpture. Wraps, pizzas, house-baked pastries, waffles and wi-fi satisfy other common traveller cravings – though at homeland prices. Even for nonsmokers the ‘VIP’ balcony out back makes for great people-watching over the street below.
镇上最好的咖啡就是在大牦牛雕塑附近这个明亮、凉爽和繁忙的地方供应的。卷饼、比萨饼、自制糕点、华夫饼和 Wi-Fi 满足了其他常见的旅行者渴望——尽管价格昂贵。即使对于不吸烟者来说，后面的“VIP”阳台也非常适合俯瞰下面街道的人群。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

AIR
空气

Kangding Airport is 43km west of town and has between one and two daily flights to Chengdu (from ¥1000) and two weekly flights to Chongqing (¥1280, 12.40pm Tuesday and Thursday).
康定机场位于镇以西 43 公里处，每天有一到两班飞往成都的航班（1000 日元起）和每周两班飞往重庆的航班（1280 日元，周二和周四中午 12：40）。

Pick up the airport shuttle (¥35, 1½ hours, 8am, 10am & 1.30pm) in front of the Airport Hotel (also signed as the Xiang Yun Hotel – 翔云酒店 – from the street front). Tickets can be bought on the bus.
在机场酒店前（从街上也标为翔云酒店 ）前乘坐机场班车（35 日元，11/2 小时，上午 8 点、上午 10 点和下午 1 点 30 分）。车票可以在巴士上购买。

BUS
总线

Kangding is a major transport hub in Sichuan, and travellers can transfer from here to most of the province. The bus station (Sichuan-Tibet Hwy, 川藏公路) is a 10-minute walk north from the centre of town (a taxi there is ¥7). Shared taxis also leave from outside the bus station (the vehicles aren’t actually parked here; instead, look for the group of men loitering on the street outside the station). They head to most western Sichuan destinations listed here, including to Chengdu (¥150 to 200), Tagong (¥50 to ¥80) and Ganzi (around ¥150). Ask for either private hire (包车, bāochē) or a shared vehicle (拼车, pīnchē).
康定是四川的主要交通枢纽，旅客可以从这里转乘到该省的大部分地区。从市中心向北步行 10 分钟即可到达巴士站 （ 河藏公路 ）（ 那里的出租车费用为 7 日元）。共享出租车也从公交车站外出发（车辆实际上并没有停在这里，而是寻找在车站外街道上闲逛的那群人）。他们前往这里列出的大多数四川西部目的地，包括成都（150 至 200 日元）、塔公（50 至 80 日元）和甘孜（约 150 日元）。要求私人租车（ 包车 ，bāochē）或共享车辆（ 拼车 ，pīnchē）。

Destinations from the bus station include the following:
从巴士站出发的目的地包括：

Baiyu ¥233, 18 hours (6am; stops overnight in Ganzi; book the day before)
白鱼 ¥233,18 小时（早上 6 点，在甘孜过夜，前一天预订）

Chengdu ¥114 to ¥135, six hours, hourly (6am to 4.30pm)
成都 114 至 135 日元，6 小时，每小时一次（早上 6 点至下午 4：30）

Chongqing ¥235, 12 hours (7am)
重庆 235 日元，12 小时（早上 7 点）

Danba ¥52, three hours, two daily (7.30am and 2.30pm)
丹巴 52 日元，三小时，每天两次（早上 7：30 和下午 2：30）

Daocheng ¥155, 10 hours (6am)
稻城 155 日元，10 小时（早上 6 点）

Ganzi ¥124, eight hours (6am)
甘孜 124 日元，八小时（早上 6 点）

Le Shan ¥114, seven hours (6am)
乐山 114 日元，7 小时（早上 6 点）

Litang ¥102, eight hours (7am)
理塘 102 日元，八小时（早上 7 点）

Tagong ¥63, three hours (3pm)
塔公 63 日元，三小时（下午 3 点）

Xiangcheng ¥174, 15 hours (6am)
襄城 174 日元，15 小时（早上 6 点）

Ya’an ¥66 to ¥73, four hours, seven daily (6am to 4pm)
雅安 66 至 73 日元，四小时，每天七点（早上 6 点至下午 4 点）

Northern Garze Prefecture
北加尔泽县

This is the Tibet you always dreamt of. A vast region where cold and barren grasslands collide with soaring mountain peaks. Where nomads with wind-reddened faces march with their yaks to the far horizon and snaking queues of pilgrims spin prayer wheels and walk a kora (pilgrim circuit) or two around thousand-year-old temples.
这就是你梦寐以求的西藏。一片广阔的地区，寒冷贫瘠的草原与高耸的山峰相撞。那里，面色被风吹得通红的游牧民族带着牦牛向遥远的地平线行进，朝圣者蜿蜒排起长队，旋转转经轮，在拥有千年历史的寺庙周围走一两个科拉 （朝圣者巡回赛）。

Once the realm of great kingdoms and marauding nomads, today the prefecture is only just being rediscovered by outsiders. Most are coming for one of two things: spiritual satisfaction in the countless temples and monasteries, or satisfaction of the soul by walking some of high Asia’s best – and least-known – trekking routes.
曾经是大王国和掠夺游牧民族的王国，如今，该县才刚刚被外人重新发现。大多数人来这里是为了两件事之一：在无数的寺庙和修道院中获得精神上的满足，或者通过走一些亚洲最好和最不为人知的徒步路线来满足灵魂。

Bring warm clothing; it can be frigid at these elevations even in midsummer. Bus services can be unreliable, and at times the government closes all or part of the region to foreign travellers with no notice. This is no place to be in a hurry.
带上保暖的衣服;即使在仲夏，在这些海拔高度也会很冷。巴士服务可能不可靠，有时政府会在没有通知的情况下关闭该地区的全部或部分地区。这里不是一个着急的地方。

Danba 丹巴
Danba 丹巴

%0836 / Pop 70,000 / Elev 1893m
% 0836 / 人口 70,000 / 学生 1893m

Danba (Dānbā; known as Rongtrak in Tibetan; 1893m) straddles a dramatic gorge near the confluence of three rivers, and makes an interesting alternative to Kangding as a gateway into or out of western Sichuan.
丹巴（Dānbā，藏语称为 Rongtrak，1893 米）横跨三条河流交汇处附近的一个壮观峡谷，是康定的一个有趣的替代方案，作为进出川西的门户。

The town is far from picturesque and isn’t very exciting, but in the surrounding hills are clusters of gorgeous and traditional stone Jiarong Tibetan and Qiang villages with ancient watchtowers and welcoming homestays. These are the real reason for coming all the way out here.
这个小镇远非风景如画，也不是很令人兴奋，但在周围的山丘上，有一群华丽而传统的石头嘉荣藏族和羌族村庄，那里有古老的瞭望塔和温馨的寄宿家庭。这些才是千里迢迢来到这里的真正原因。

1Sights
1 景点

The 30m- to 60m-high ancient stone towers scattered throughout the villages overlooking the Dadu River were built by the Qiang between 700 and 1200 years ago. Some enterprising families have opened theirs up to travellers (¥10 to ¥20) who are willing to climb log ladders 6m up to the entrance.
30 米至 60 米高的古石塔散布在俯瞰大渡河的村庄各处，是羌族在 700 至 1200 年前建造的。一些有进取心的家庭已经向愿意爬上 6m 长的原木梯子到达入口的旅行者开放（10 至 20 日元）。

Household towers were signs of status, and were used to store precious goods (and family members during wartime). Village towers were taller, built for conducting religious rituals, demarcating borders and passing smoke signals. In wartime, they were used to launch assaults against Tibetan marauders and the Qing army.
家庭塔楼是地位的标志，用于存放贵重物品（以及战时的家庭成员）。村楼更高，是为了举行宗教仪式、划定边界和传递烟雾信号而建造的。战时，它们被用来对藏族掠夺者和清军发动攻击。

You can string together some nice day walks strolling between the towers and villages. There are lots of big shady trees and deep green fields of crops set against a backdrop of mountain spires.
您可以在塔楼和村庄之间漫步，进行一些美好的一日散步。这里有许多成荫的大树和深绿色的农田，背景是山尖。

oZhongluVILLAGE
o 中路村

(中路)

Comparatively remote Zhonglu, 13km from Danba, is less a village and more a collection of grand, traditional stone houses spread across a lush, green mountain slope. It’s blissfully cool and quiet, and though there’s not much to actually do (the energetic could hike up to the mountain ridge behind the village) it’s a peaceful place to rest up and to acclimatise if you’ll be heading further west afterwards. Many of the houses have watchtowers that you can visit.
相对偏远的中路距离丹巴 13 公里，与其说是一个村庄，不如说是分布在郁郁葱葱的绿色山坡上的宏伟传统石屋的集合。这里凉爽而安静，虽然实际上没有什么可做的（精力充沛的人可以徒步到村庄后面的山脊），但如果您之后要向西行驶，这是一个安静的休息和适应的地方。许多房屋都有瞭望塔可供您参观。

Jiaju ZangzhaiVILLAGE
嘉居藏寨村

(甲居藏寨; adult/student ¥50/25)
（ 甲居藏寨 ;成人/学生 50/25 日元）

Of all the pretty villages in the hills around here, Danba tourism’s pride and joy is Jiaju, 12km northwest of town and perched at the top of a multiswitchback road that winds up a steep river gorge. With fruit trees, charming Tibetan stone houses and homestays, Jiaju’s quaint architecture will pull in travellers for a half-day (or longer) visit.
在这附近山上所有美丽的村庄中，丹巴旅游引以为豪的是夹居，它位于城镇西北 12 公里处，坐落在一条蜿蜒陡峭的河谷的多折返公路的顶部。嘉居古色古香的建筑拥有果树、迷人的西藏石屋和民宿，将吸引游客进行半天（或更长时间）的游览。

SuopoVILLAGE
索波村

(梭坡)
( 梭坡 )

Danba’s nearest village with watchtowers is a 1½- to two-hour walk along the river. A resourceful family has rebuilt the wooden base levels of a tower next to their home; visitors can climb up the inside from their rooftop (¥15). Don’t worry about finding them: they, or a ‘friend’ of theirs, will find you.
丹巴最近的有瞭望塔的村庄沿着河边步行 1 个半到两个小时。一个足智多谋的家庭重建了他们家旁边一座塔楼的木基层;游客可以从屋顶爬上内部（15 日元）。不要担心找不到他们：他们或他们的“朋友”会找到你。

To get to Suopo, turn east out of Danba’s cluster of hostels and follow the river. Turn down the track beside the small police station after about 5km, then cross the small suspension bridge and keep walking up to the village. Look for stone steps under some large trees up to your left, just after you reach the village’s first couple of buildings. These steps lead to the nearest towers.
要前往索浦，请从丹巴的旅馆群向东转，沿着河流行驶。大约5公里后，沿着小警察局旁边的小路转下，然后穿过小吊桥，继续往村里走。在到达村庄的前几座建筑物后，在左边的一些大树下寻找石阶。这些台阶通向最近的塔楼。
